Cool and serve with whipped topping or vanilla ice cream. ; name: tex mex chicken sandwiches ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, salsa, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, lettuce, avocado, garlic salt, hamburger buns ; preparation:Place chicken breasts in plastic zippered bag with salsa or picante sauce. Zip shut and refrigerate 1 hour. Place on barbecue grill and cook for 5 minutes on each side. Top with cheese and close top of grill until cheese melts. Spread bottoms of each hamburger bun with avocado mixture. Top with lettuce, tomato, chicken breasts and top of buns. ; name: pumpkins spice muffins ; ingredients: canned pumpkin, milk, egg, biscuit mix, sugar, ground nutmeg, ground cinnamon, ground ginger, butter ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. In a mixing bowl, combine pumpkin, milk and egg with a fork. Combine dry ingredients. Add to mixing bowl and stir just until moistened. Spoon into 12 well-greased muffin cups. Combine streusel ingredients. Sprinkle over muffins. Bake at 400f for 15 minutes or until golden brown. Serve warm. ; name: aztec hot chocolate ; ingredients: skim milk, sugar, honey, ground ginger, ground cloves, ground red pepper, unsweetened cocoa, vanilla extract, whipped cream ; preparation:

name: karate baked caramel corn ; ingredients: popped corn, margarine, brown sugar, corn syrup, baking soda, vanilla ; preparation:Heat oven to 250 degrees f. Put popped corn in a large lightly buttered roasting pan. Melt margarine in medium saucepan. Stir in brown sugar and corn syrup. Bring to a boil, stirring constantly. Boil without stirring 5 minutes. Remove from heat and stir in soda and vanilla. Pour over popped corn gradually, mixing well. Bake one hour, stirring every 15 minutes. Remove from oven and cool completely. Break apart if necessary and store in tightly covered tin box. ; name: beef and bean burritos ; ingredients: beef round steak, garlic, pinto beans, diced green chilies, cilantro, flour tortillas, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Spray nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Heat over med. Heat. Add steak and garlic. Cook until desired doneness. Stir in beans, chilis, and cilantro. Cook and stir 7 minutes. Spoon mixture on tortillas. Top with cheese. Fold bottom up, fold sides over. Garnish with salsa, sour cream. ; name: no yeast irish brown bread ; ingredients: flour, whole wheat flour, natural bran, sugar, baking soda, sour milk, oil ; preparation:Mix flours, bran, sugar and soda. Make well in centre. Pour in sour milk and oil. Stir until moistened. Pour into greased loaf pan. Bake 1 hour at 350 degrees. ; name: easy ham carbonara ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, onion, vegetable oil, ham, chicken broth, margarine, egg yolks, fresh parsley, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta. In a skillet, saute the onion in oil. Add the ham, broth and margarine and heat through. Add drained pasta to ham mixture. Pour in egg yolks and cook until the eggs are completely set. Sprinkle with parsley and parmesan cheese and toss to coat. ; name: savory egg casserole ; ingredients: cheddar cheese, butter, cream, prepared mustard, salt, pepper, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Sprinkle cheese in 9x9 inch square baking dish. Dot with butter. Mix cream, mustard, salt, and pepper, and pour half of the mixture over the cheese. Pour eggs on top. Pour remaining cream mixture over the eggs. Bake 25 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: grilled broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, olive oil, kosher salt, granulated sugar ; preparation:Cut up broccoli into spearlike pieces. Place in a pyrex dish. Coat broccoli pieces with olive oil. Sprinkle with salt and sugar. Cover dish with foil. Place dish on medium to low heat on grill. Heat for approximately 15 minutes. ; name: tomato thokku ; ingredients: tomatoes, salt, chili powder, turmeric powder, hing, mustard seeds, oil ; preparation:Wash the tomatoes and cut them into small pieces. Add oil in your pan, when it is heated add mustard seeds. Let the mustard seed splutter. Add tomatoes, turmeric powder, chilli powder and asafoetida. Cook them nicely in a low flame, till the oil sticks out. Relish it with chappati or with bread sandwich. ; name: easy turkey tetrazzini ; ingredients: spaghetti, white mushroom, butter, cooked turkey, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, salt and pepper, parsley ; preparation:

name: cinnamon mint tea ; ingredients: water, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves, whole allspice, fresh mint leaves ; preparation:Bring first 4 ingredients to a boil. Boil 1 minute. Stir in mint leaves. Remove from heat and allow to steep for 10 minutes. Strain. ; name: low fat ice cream cassata slice ; ingredients: low-fat chocolate ice cream, pine nuts, low-fat vanilla ice cream, dried apricots, dried figs, dried peaches, glace green cherries, glace red cherries ; preparation:Line a 20 cm x 10 cm bar tin with enough plastic wrap to hang down the sides of the tin. Put the chocolate ice cream and pine nuts in a bowl and mix to combine. Spoon the mixture into the base and up the sides of the tin, leaving the centre hollow. Freeze until firm. Mix the vanilla icecream with the dried fruit and spoon into the bar tin over the chocolate ice cream. Smooth the surface and cover with overhanging plastic wrap. Freeze overnight until firm. Remove from the tin, discard the plastic and slice with a knife heated in hot water. ; name: carne adovada marinated pork ; ingredients: pork ribs, salt, garlic, whole leaf oregano, blended red chili sauce ; preparation:Sprinkle meat with salt. Add garlic and oregano to blended chili. Pour over meat and marinate in refrigerator 6-8 hours or overnight. Cook slowly on top of stove or in 350 oven until meat is done, about 1 hour. Thick slices of potatoes may be marinated with the meat. ; name: pollo al diablo ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, hot sauce, ketchup, sour cream, paprika, honey, ground cumin, vegetable oil ; preparation:In a bowl, mix hot sauce, honey, and sour cream until well blended. Add paprika, cumin and ketchup and beat vigorously until sauce is well blended and smooth,. Marinate the chicken in half the sauce for at least 2 hours in the refrigerator. Heat a heavy skillet or grill coated with vegetable oil. Brown breast halves on both sides in oil until cooked through. Heat rest of sauce and serve with the chicken. ; name: basic seven minute frosting and or peanut butter frosting ; ingredients: egg whites, granulated sugar, water, white corn syrup, salt, vanilla ; preparation:In the top bowl of a double boiler off the heat, combine all the ingredients except the vanilla. Beat the mixture for about 1 minute to mix thoroughly. Rest the bowl over simmering water over medium heat and whisk constantly for 7 minutes, or until frosting shows stiff peaks and has tripled in volume. Lift the pan off the water and whisk vigorously until frosting has cooled and is thick and glossy. This stays at its fluffiest if you first whisk together the peanut butter and about a cup of frosting. Then fold in the rest of the frosting gently with a rubber spatula. ; name: bbq crock pot beef ; ingredients: beef stew meat, chili sauce, water, onion soup mix, brown sugar, mustard, vinegar, celery ; preparation:Cut or trim beef if needed. Place all ingredients in crock pot. Stir to combine. Cover. Turn on high for 4-5 hours low for 6-8 hours. Taste great served on rice or egg noodles. ; name: oven crusty fish ; ingredients: egg, water, tabasco sauce, salt, fish fillets, corn flake crumbs, butter ; preparation:Combine egg, water, tabasco, and salt, beat until well blended. Dip fish fillets in egg mixture. Coat generously with corn flake crumbs. Place on foil-lined baking sheet. Drizzle with melted butter. Bake at 375 degrees for 20-30 minutes. ; name: pizza flavored snack mix ; ingredients: crispix cereal, parmesan cheese, spaghetti sauce mix, garlic powder, pretzel nuggets, vegetable oil ; preparation:

name: basic sugar cut out cookies ; ingredients: sugar, egg, vanilla, butter, shortening, plain flour, chocolate chips ; preparation:Cream together sugar and butter. Beat in the egg and vanilla. If using spices add them at this point, i like a combination of 1 tsp ground ginger, 1 tsp of cinnamon and half a tsp of allspice. But have also made them using a cup of chocolate chips. Add in the flour a cup at a time. Roll out between two sheets of baking paper and place onto ungreased cookie sheets. I roll out about half a centimetre thick when cutting out and put on an ungreased cookie sheet. Bake at 400 for about 6-10 minutes, the time taken depends on the size of cutters you have used. Cool for a minute on the cookie sheet then transfer to a wire rack before decorating. ; name: grilled peaches with blue cheese ; ingredients: balsamic vinegar, sugar, fresh peaches, blue cheese ; preparation:In a saucepan over medium heat, stir together the sugar, balsamic vinegar. Simmer until liquid has reduced by half, it should become slightly thicker. Remove from heat and set aside. Preheat grill to medium-high heat. Place peaches cut side down onto the grill, and cook for about 5 minutes, or until the flesh is toasted. Turn peaches over. Brush the top sides with the balsamic glaze, and cook for another 2-3 minutes. Transfer the peach halves to individual dishes and drizzle with the remaining glaze. Sprinkle with with crumbled blue cheese. ; name: nthochi banana bread ; ingredients: margarine, sugar, flour, egg, milk, baking powder, salt, bananas ; preparation:Grease a loaf pan well. Preheat oven to 325degrees f. Cream margarine with sugar. Beat in egg. Add flour, salt, baking powder, milk, and bananas. Pour into loaf pan. Bake for about 1 hour. Cool well and slice. ; name: new potatoes in creamy dill sauce ; ingredients: tiny new potatoes, water, chive & onion cream cheese, milk, dill weed ; preparation:Microwave potatoes and water in covered 3-quart microwaveable dish on high 15 to 17 minutes or until potatoes are tender. Stirring after 10 minutes. Drain. Return potatoes to dish. Set aside. Microwave cream cheese spread and milk in microwaveable bowl 1 minute. Stir until smooth. Pour over potatoes. Sprinkle with dill. Microwave 1 to 2 minutes or until heated through. Stir gently. ; name: chili corn ; ingredients: whole kernel corn, green chilies, cream cheese, margarine, milk, garlic salt, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Combine milk, cream cheese, and margarine in a medium sauce pan. Stir over low heat until melted. After melted, add corn. When heated through, place in dish and sprinkle with garlic salt. Bake for 30 minutes at 325 degrees. Garnish with cheddar cheese. ; name: heavenly raspberry pie ; ingredients: 9-inch pie shell, fresh raspberries, sugar, cold water, cornstarch, lemon juice ; preparation:Prepare pie crust as directed and bake. Set aside. In medium saucepan mix 2 cups raspberries, sugar, cold water, lemon juice and cornstarch. Cook and stir over medium heat until it is thick and bubbles. Then cook it 2 more minutes. Remove from heat and cool slightly. Cover and refrigerate until thoroughly chilled. Gently fold in 2 more cups of raspberries. Spoon into the cooled pie shell. Cover and chill for at least 2 more hours or until firm. Serve with remaining cup of berries and whipped cream. ; name: fabada ; ingredients: dried fava beans, extra virgin olive oil, saffron thread, smoked paprika, garlic cloves, smoked ham hock, thick slab bacon, spanish chorizo, blood sausage, onion ; preparation:Drain the beans. Put them in a large pot, add water to cover by 2 inches, and bring to a boil. Skim off any foam, lower the heat to a simmer, and add the olive oil, saffron, pimentn, garlic, ham hock, and bacon. Simmer for 1 hour, adding more water as necessary to keep the beans covered. Add the chorizo, morcilla, and onion and simmer for another 2 hours, or until the beans are very soft. Add water as necessary to keep the beans and meats covered. Remove from the heat, remove the meats, and let cool slightly. Remove the meat from the ham hock and shred it into bite-sized pieces. Cut the bacon into 1-inch chunks and cut the sausages into thick slices. Discard the garlic and onion, ladle the beans into bowls, and nestle the various meats in the beans. ; name: pork chop onion and rice casserole ; ingredients: pork chops, oil, dry onion soup mix, frozen mixed vegetables, uncooked rice, beef broth ; preparation:

name: roasted red pepper couscous ; ingredients: couscous, olive oil, onion, zucchini, roasted red peppers, chickpeas, lemon juice, basil leaves, nicoise olive ; preparation:Place the couscous in a large bowl. Bring 2 cups of lightly salted water to a boil. Pour the water over couscous and cover with plastic wrap. Let sit for 10 min. Uncover and fluff with a fork. Meanwhile heat the oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and zucchini and cook until lightly browned. Add the zucchini and onion, along with the remaining ingredients to the couscous and mix well. Season with aditional salt and freshly ground pepper if desired. ; name: choc walnut and oat slice ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, honey, rolled oats, self raising flour, walnuts, chocolate chips ; preparation:Heat oven 180c. Grease and line pan - 20cm x 30 cm. Melt butter, sugar and honey in pot. Stir gently till sugar dissolves. Stir in oats, flour and nuts. Cool mixture. Add choc chips. Press mixture into pan. Bake 20 minutes. ; name: low fat creamy potato soup ; ingredients: potatoes, yellow onion, carrots, celery ribs, vegetable broth, creamed corn, bay leaf, paprika, green onion top ; preparation:In a separate pan cover 3 diced and peeled potatoes with water and simmer until tender. Drain water and mix until cooked potatoes are a thick liquid. In a large pot, add vegetable broth, potato diced with peel, onion, carrots, and celery. Stir and cook until potatoes are soft. Add liquefied potatoes, cooked cream corn, bay leaf, and paprika, stir. Add green onions, stir. ; name: the queen s spread ; ingredients: pimento stuffed olives, garlic powder, paprika, pepper, cream cheese ; preparation:Set your cream out until soft and quarter. Chop olives. Add one quarter to the bowl and mix in a small amount of the chopped olives. After the second quarter add the rest of the ingredients. Add the rest of the cream and keep mixing ingredients until there seems to be equal amounts throughout the spread of all the ingredients. ; name: vegetable curry microwave ; ingredients: onion, green curry paste, vegetables, chickpeas, light coconut milk, lemon juice, soy sauce, nuts ; preparation:Place onion and curry paste in 3 ltr casserole dish. Cook on full power 2 minutes. Add vegetables, chick peas, coconut milk, lemon juice and soy sauce. Cook full power 6-8 minutes. Sprinkle with chopped nuts. Serve with jasmine rice. ; name: baked maple and cinnamon squash ; ingredients: margarine, maple syrup, ground cinnamon, brown sugar, butternut squash ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees, line pan with parchment paper. Place squash on pan cut side up. Combine remaining ingredients and brush half of the mixture on the squash. Bake for 45 minute or until tender. Brush once more halfway through baking, and again near the end. ; name: masala winter squash ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, dried chilies, canola oil, salt and pepper, curry powder, chopped tomato, water, winter squash, lime ; preparation:Place onions and garlic into food processor bowl and grind until it is turns into a paste. Add oil to a saucepan or skillet over medium heat. Add garlic-onion paste, salt, pepper and curry and saut for 5 to 10 minutes. Stir occasionally and allow the onions to brown. Add drained tomatoes, chili and squash to the skillet. Stir in in cup of water or reserved liquid from canned tomatoes if using. Cover and adjust heat so that you achieve a low simmer. Stir occasionally, adding more liquid as needed. Squash should be tender and ready to serve in 20 minutes. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Serve with lime wedges. ; name: mushrooms for the bbq ; ingredients: oil, butter, mushrooms, garlic, chives, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: lemon dijon green beans ; ingredients: green beans, butter, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, dill weed, slivered almonds, salt and pepper ; preparation:I usually steam the green beans for 5-7 minutes to get them a bit tender. Melt butter or margarine in large frying pan. Add green beans and cook on medium hight heat until coated with butter. Add lemon juice, mustard and dill. Toss with beans until coated well and heated through. Check taste, add salt or pepper if desired. Sprinkle with toased almonds before serving. ; name: sticky onion chicken healthy low fat ; ingredients: skinless chicken breasts, salt & freshly ground black pepper, sweet chili sauce, honey, fresh ginger, red onion, lime, juice of ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400f. Season the chicken breasts with salt and black pepper and place in the bottom of an ovenproof dish. Combine the marinade ingredients in a mixing bowl. Pour the marinade over the chicken and leave to marinate for at least 1 hour. Place the chicken with the marinade in the oven and bake for 25-30 minutes until fully cooked. Serve straight from the oven. ; name: hot olive cheese puffs ; ingredients: sharp cheddar cheese, butter, all-purpose flour, salt, paprika, pimento stuffed olives ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400f. To make dough, blend the cheese with the butter. Stir in the flour, salt, and paprika. Mix well. Wrap 1 teaspoon of dough around each olive overlapping completely. Bake until light brown, 12 to 15 minutes. ; name: macaroni and bacon casserole ; ingredients: macaroni noodles, shredded cheddar cheese, vegetable cocktail, bacon, salt, pepper, milk ; preparation:Cook noodles as directed on package, drain. Add shredded cheese to cooked noodles while still hot and mix together. Add v8. Add enough milk so there is juice on the bottom of casserole dish, enough that it doesnt dry out, so the milk may not be necessary. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover casserole with uncooked bacon slices. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 45 minutes to an hour. Bacon needs to be cooked on top. ; name: curried corn salad ; ingredients: red onion, red pepper, green pepper, curry powder, oregano, turmeric, corn, black olives, miracle whip, sea salt ; preparation:Saute onion in oil until tender. Add peppers and saute briefly, just until warmed through. Add curry powder, oregano, and turmeric. While the peppers are sauteing, heat the corn until hot, and drain any liquid. In a large bowl, mix the pepper mixture, drained corn, black olives, miracle whip, and salt. Serve warm. ; name: south croatian sauted french beans ; ingredients: french beans, butter, onions, tomatoes, garlic clove, stock, pepper, salt, fresh parsley leaves ; preparation:Clean the french beans and cut into two or three parts. Saut finely minced onion on butter until translucent. In the meantime put french beans into hot water and cook 5-8 minutes, than remove from water and drain. Add french beans into sauted onion. Add tomato juice, very finely minced garlic and parsley. Season it with salt and pepper. Stir and add some beef stock to cover french beans. Cook until french beans are soft, or 20-30 minutes adding beef stock if necessary. ; name: spicy chicken fritters ; ingredients: chicken breasts, egg, onions, spring onion, red chile, salt, pepper, oil ; preparation:Place chicken in a bowl and add other ingredients. Mix well. Heat oil approx 2cm in depth. Drop teaspoonfuls of mixture into the hot oil. Deep fry for a few minutes until golden brown. Drain on paper towel. Serve with cucumber mint dip. ; name: sahlep salep sahlab ; ingredients: instant tea, sugar, cinnamon, milk ; preparation:

name: one for all marinated beef ; ingredients: orange juice, reduced sodium soy sauce, brown sugar, prepared mustard, canola oil, garlic cloves, beef flank steak ; preparation:In a large resealable plastic bag, combine the first six ingredients. Add flank steak. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 4 hours or overnight. Coat grill rack with nonstick cooking spray before starting the grill. Drain and discard marinade. Grill steak, covered, over medium heat for 6-8 minutes on each side or until meat reaches desired doneness. Let stand for 10 minutes before slicing. ; name: banana walnut buttermilk bread ; ingredients: sugar, unsalted butter, eggs, bananas, vanilla, baking soda, buttermilk, unbleached flour, walnuts ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. In a large bowl cream together the sugar and the butter. Add eggs one at a time, beating after each addition. Beat in mashed bananas and vanilla and continue beating until mixture is smooth. In a large measuring cup stir baking soda into the buttermilk and add it to the banana mixture along with the flour and chopped nuts. Stir the batter until it is just combined. Pour batter into a greased and floured 9x5 inch loaf pan and bake for one hour or until tooth pick inserted in the center comes out clean. Transfer the bread to a rack and let it cool in the pan for 10 minutes. Turn it out onto a rack and let it cool completely. ; name: skillet macaroni beef ; ingredients: ground beef, macaroni, onion, green pepper, tomato sauce, water, salt, pepper, worcestershire sauce, sliced mushrooms ; preparation:Cook beef in a large skillet until no longer red. Remove from skillet, using a slotted spoon so as to save liquid in the skillet. Cook macaroni, onion and green pepper in drippings until macaroni is yellow. Return meat to skillet along with tomato sauce, water, salt, pepper and worcestershire sauce. Cover and simmer 25 minutes. ; name: nora ephron s mashed potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, heavy cream, butter, salt, pepper ; preparation:Put potato in a large pot of salted water and bring to a boil. Lower the heat and simmer for 20 minutes, until tender. Drain and place potatoes back in the pot over low heat and shake the pan to remove excess moisture. Peel. Put through a potato ricer and immediately add 1 tablespoons of heavy cream and add as much melted butter and salt and pepper as you feel like. Eat immediately. ; name: sweet onion smothered steak sauce ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, chicken broth, barbecue sauce, butter, salt ; preparation:Heat 1 tblspn oil in nonstick skillet. Cook onion with dash of salt, until soft and lightly brown. Add broth, barbecue sauce and simmer until slightly thickened. Whisk in butter and season with salt and pepper. Spoon over steak and serve. ; name: queso dip with tequila by rick bayless ; ingredients: olive oil, tomatoes, jalapenos, onion, salt, tequila, monterey jack cheese, cilantro, tortilla chips ; preparation:In a large skillet, heat the olive oil. Add teh tomatoes, jalapenos, onion, and a large pinch of salt and cook over moderately high heat. Stirring often, until softened, about 5 minutes. Add the tequila and cook, stirring frequently, until the pan looks dry, about 2 minutes. Reduce the heat to low. Add the cheese and cook, stirring constantly until fully melted, about 30 seconds. Quickly transfer the cheeese dip to a serving bowl. Sprinkle with the cilantro and serve immediately with hips. ; name: honey glazed chicken kabobs ; ingredients: reduced-sodium soy sauce, honey, canola oil, prepared horseradish, steak seasoning, garlic cloves, boneless skinless chicken breasts, sweet red pepper, green pepper, onion ; preparation:In a small bowl, combine the first six ingredients. Pour 1 cup marinade into a large resealable plastic bag. Add the chicken. Seal bag and turn to coat. Refrigerate for 5-6 hours. Cover and refrigerate remaining marinade. Drain and discard marinade. On six- eight metal or soaked wooden skewers, alternately thread chicken and vegetables. Grill, covered, over medium heat for 5-7 minutes on each side or until chicken juices run clear, basting frequently with reserved marinade. ; name: curry massalla gravy ; ingredients: onion, garlic cloves, passata, turmeric powder, garam masala powder, green cardamom seeds, vegetable oil, water, salt ; preparation:

name: amazing apples with creamy caramel dip ; ingredients: brown sugar, cream cheese, vanilla extract, caramel ice cream topping, toffee pieces, walnuts, apples ; preparation:Mix sugar, cream cheese and vanilla with mixer until smooth. Spread into a deep pie dish. Spread caramel topping on top, then sprinkle with toffee bits and nuts. Refrigerate until ready to serve. Just before serving, core and cut apples into wedges and arrange around the edge of the pie dish, alternating red and green slices. ; name: mom s skillet macaroni and beef ; ingredients: extra lean ground beef, elbow macaroni, onion, ground black pepper, reduced-sodium tomato sauce, water, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Brown beef in a large skillet and drain. Add macaroni, onion, and pepper. Cook, stirring, until macaroni is transparent. Add tomato sauce, water, and worcestershire sauce. Cover and simmer for 20 minutes. Stir, turn off heat, and allow to sit on warm burner for another 5 minutes. ; name: bea s favorite egg salad ; ingredients: miracle whip, cider vinegar, salt, onion, worcestershire sauce, mustard, pepper, eggs, celery, green peppers ; preparation:In medium bowl, stir miracle whip and vinegar, salt, onion, worchestershire sauce, mustard and pepper until well mixed. Cut up the eggs and add them along with celery, add green pepper to the miracle whip mixture. Mix well. Cover and refrigerate till well chilled. Serve as you like. ; name: quick and easy longevity noodles ; ingredients: cornstarch, water, sesame oil, soy sauce, egg, chicken-flavored ramen noodles, cooked chicken, green onions ; preparation:Stir the cornstarch, water and sesame oil in a small cup. Set the mixture aside. Heat the broth and soy in a 3-quart saucepan over medium-high heat to a boil. Stir the cornstarch mixture and stir it into the saucepan. Cook and stir until mixture is slightly thickened. Reduce the heat to low. Add the eggs, in a slow steady stream, stirring while adding. Remove the saucepan from the heat. Divide the pasta, chicken and green onions among 8 serving bowls. Ladle about 1 cup broth mixture into each bowl and serve immediately. ; name: yaki mondoo pot stickers ; ingredients: ground beef, onion, green pepper, colby cheese, cheddar cheese, cooked rice, sweet and sour sauce, egg roll wraps, oil ; preparation:Cook ground beef with onion and pepper. Mix all ingredients together, except wraps and oil. Heat oil. Fill wraps with meat, cheese and rice mixture. Deep fry until golden brown. ; name: german spice cookies ; ingredients: eggs, brown sugar, clove, cinnamon, pepper, flour, baking soda, salt, raisins, nuts ; preparation:In a mixing bowl, beat eggs. Add the brown sugar, cloves, cinnamon and pepper. Combine flour, baking soda and salt, gradually add to the egg mix. Stir in raisin and nuts. Drop by tablespoonsful 2 inches apart onto a lightly greased baking sheet. Bake at 400 degrees for 8-10 minutes or until surface cracks. Remove to wire racks to cool. ; name: japanese sweet potato and rice shojin ryori ; ingredients: sweet potatoes, medium grain rice, salt, sake ; preparation:Peel sweet potato and cut into bite size pieces. Wash rice using several changes of water. Place rice, sweet potato pieces, salt to taste and sake in the rice cooker. Put your hand flat on the top of the rice and pour in cold water until it reaches where your wrist starts. Let it sit for about 20 minutes before cooking the rice. Once the cooking cycle is done, let it sit for about 15 to 20 minutes and fluff with a wooden or plastic rice paddle. ; name: potatoes paprika ; ingredients: butter, shallot, hungarian paprika, tomatoes, salt and pepper, sour cream, potatoes, chicken stock ; preparation:

name: krispie candies ; ingredients: chocolate chips, butterscotch chips, chow mein noodles, salted peanuts ; preparation:Put chocolate chips and butterscotch chips in the saucepan. Put the saucepan on the burner and turn on the stove to low. Stir and stir until the mixture is melted and smooth. Remove saucepan from heat. Turn off the burner and quickly add the chow mein noodles and the peanuts. Mix and stir until they are evenly coated. Cover the cookie sheets with wax paper. Drop the candy by teaspoonfuls onto the wax paper-covered cookie sheets. Put the cookie sheets into the refrigerator to cool the candies. When they are cool, take them off the waxed paper. Put them in plastic bags. Keep them in the refrigerator. ; name: scandinavian cucumber salad recipe ; ingredients: sour cream, parsley flakes, tarragon vinegar, sugar, chives, cucumbers ; preparation:Thinly slice unpeeled cucumbers - use can use a mandolin or slicer for nice paper thin slices. Should be about 3 cups. Whisk sour cream, parsley, vinegar, sugar, and chives in a small bowl. Fold in sliced cucumbers. Cover and chill for at least two hours. ; name: easy krab egg rolls baked low fat ; ingredients: egg roll wraps, imitation crabmeat, cabbage and carrot coleslaw mix, onion, sesame oil, soy sauce, ground ginger, garlic powder ; preparation:Mix all ingredients except egg roll wrappers. Place wrappers in a wet paper towel. Keep them covered as you work with them. Spray a 15 x 10 jelly roll pan with cooking spray. Place a wrapper on work surface laying in a diamond shape. Place about 2 t of mixture in center of wrapper. Fold top point to middle, then fold side points in. Roll from top to bottom, place seam side down on prepared pan. Continue in this manner till you run out of filling or wrappers. Spray tops with cooking spray. Bake at 350 for 20 to 25 minutes or till golden brown. ; name: butter lettuce and herb salad ; ingredients: fennel bulb, butter lettuce, fresh tarragon leaves, scallions, fresh lemon juice, dijon mustard, kosher salt, black pepper, extra virgin olive oil, pecorino romano cheese ; preparation:In a large bowl add the fennel, lettuce, tarragon and scallion. Set aside. Add lemon juice, mustard, salt, and pepper to a small bowl and whisk together. While whisking constantly, slowly add the oil. When well combined pour the vinaigrette over the salad and toss to coat. Top with the pecorino if desired and serve immediately. ; name: sam s loaded nachos ; ingredients: hamburger, garlic, dried chili pepper flakes, nacho chips, refried beans, black olives, chunky salsa, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Fry hamburger with garlic and chili peppers. Drain. Meanwhile spread nacho chips around on a large cookie sheet. Top with refried beans. Sprinkle olives on top. Add salsa. Sprinkle as much or as little cheese as you want. Place in oven and heat for 15 mins. ; name: no bake strawberry cheesecake tarts light ; ingredients: low-fat plain yogurt, miniature graham cracker pie crusts, egg white, low fat cottage cheese, sugar, vanilla, cinnamon, strawberry, strawberry all-fruit spread ; preparation:Place the yogurt in a yogurt strainer or a mesh strainer lined with a paper coffee filter, place in refrigerator and allow to drain for several hours or overnight. Preheat oven to 375 degrees, lightly brush the tart shells with egg white and bake for 5 minutes, cool completely. In a blender container, combine the cottage cheese, drained yogurt, sweetner, vanilla and cinnamon. Divide evenly into the tart shells, place in refrigerator and allow to set for 2 to 3 hours. Place the fruit spread in a small microwave safe bowl and warm. Mix the sliced strawberries and fruit spread, cover and refrigerator. When ready to serve, spoon the strawberry mixture on top of the tarts and enjoy. ; name: barbecued fish steaks ; ingredients: salmon fillets, onion, garlic, butter, lemon juice, soy sauce, salt, orange juice, ground pepper ; preparation:Saut onion and garlic in butter or margarine until tender. Add ingredients through ground peppercorn and simmer for about 7 minutes, stirring occasionally. Cool. Pour liquid into a zip-lock type storage bag. Add salmon. Marinate in refrigerator 45 minutes, turning after about 20 minute intervals. Remove fish from marinade. Place on well-greased, hinged wire grill. Cook 2 inches from coals for 3 minutes, basting frequently with sauce. Turn and cook for about 5 minutes longer, or until fish is done. ; name: lower fat burrito casserole ; ingredients: flour tortillas, refried beans, enchilada sauce, onion ; preparation:

name: mexican dinner pronto ; ingredients: vegetable oil, onion, tamales, chili without beans, chili with beans, oregano, monterey jack cheese ; preparation:In skillet heat oil. Saute onion until tender. Transfer to ovenproof baking dish. Arrange half the tamales and gravy over onions. Add the two cans of chili. Sprinkle with oregano. Top with remaining tamales. Bake at 350 for 30 minutes, or until bubbling hot. Remove from oven. Sprinkle with cheese. Bake 15 minutes more or until cheese has melted. ; name: pizza bagel omelets ; ingredients: eggs, parmesan cheese, italian spices, fresh garlic, pizza toppings, tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, bagels ; preparation:Melt the butter in a large frying pan. Add the parmesan cheese, italian spices, and garlic and mix well. Add the beaten eggs to the pan and cook until almost set. Top with the pizza toppings and cook until the eggs are set and the toppings are heated through. Remove the omelet from the pan and cut in quarters. Fold each quarter into a triangle and place on top of a bagel half. Top with the tomatoes and mozzarella. Broil until the cheese melts and the toppings are hot. ; name: tuna brandade ; ingredients: potatoes, skim milk, garlic cloves, shallot, tuna in water, white wine vinegar, olive oil, dill sprigs, crostini ; preparation:Peel and cut the potatoes into 1. 5cm cubes, place in a saucepan with milk, garlic and eschalot, then bring to the boil, reduce heat and simmer for 8-10 mins until potato is soft. Remove pan from heat, then add tuna to potato mixture. Mash gently with a fork but still leavequite chunky. Add the vinegar, oil and half the dill sprigs, then stir to combine. Serve on crostini with remaining dill. ; name: creamy crescent roll cheesecake ; ingredients: cream cheese, sour cream, sugar, vanilla, eggs, cinnamon, refrigerated crescent dinner rolls ; preparation:Beat cream cheese, sour cream, sugar and vanilla until smooth. Add eggs one at a time, beating thoroughly after each addition. Line a 9x13 pan with the crescent rolls. Pinch dough together to seal seams. Pour in filling and sprinkle with cinnamon. Bake at 350 for 35 minutes. ; name: easy day coconut pie ; ingredients: cream cheese, sugar, milk, flaked coconut, cool whip, almond extract, graham cracker crust ; preparation:Combine cream cheese, sugar, milk and coconut in bowl. Mix at medium speed till well blended. Fold in cool whip. Add extract, spoon into crust. Freeze for about 4 hours. Sprinkle with additional coconut, toasted, if desired. Let stand at room temperature for 5 minutes before serving. Store in freezer. ; name: rooster cookies sugar cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, egg, salt, flour ; preparation:Cream together the butter and sugar. Beat in 1 egg, add salt and flour. Mix all ingredients are well blended. Chill dough for 3-4 hours before rolling. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Roll out and cut. Bake about 8-10 minutes or until barely colored. Cookies can be frosted and decorated or eaten just plain. ; name: red star basic chicken taco filling ; ingredients: oil, cooked chicken, onion, garlic cloves, tomatoes with juice, green chilies, cumin seed, salt, black pepper, water ; preparation:Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Sautee chicken, onion and garlic until onion softens and chicken begins to brown crisp on edges, about 8-12 minutes. Salt and pepper to taste. Reduce heat to medium. Stir in tomatoes, chiles and cumin. If needed add enough water just to make the mixture a little soupy. Continue to cook, stirring occassionally, until liquid is reduced. Mixture should be moist, not wet or dry. Use immediately or freeze for later. ; name: chili garlic broccoli ; ingredients: broccoli, red chili pepper, garlic clove, vegetable oil, dark soy sauce ; preparation:

name: blueberry dream cake ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, butter, egg whites, vanilla, fresh blueberries, low-fat plain yogurt, egg, lemons ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, butter, egg whites, and vanilla. Mix well. Press onto bottom of 10 inch springform pan. Layer blueberries on base. In large bowl combine flour, yogurt, egg, sugar, vanilla, and lemon rind. Mix until smooth. Pour over blueberries. Bake 60-70 minutes or until cake is firm and golden. ; name: almost unsweetened applesauce homemade ; ingredients: apples, water, sugar, cinnamon, ground cloves ; preparation:Put apples and water in saucepan. Cover and bring to boil. Lower heat and simmer, stirring occasionally for 20 minutes. Stir in sugar, cinnamon and cloves. Cook until all sugar is dissolved. Serve warm or let cool. ; name: triple chocolate popcorn ; ingredients: popped popcorn, dark chocolate, milk chocolate, white chocolate ; preparation:Do not use microwave popcorn. Either purchase already popped corn or pop using the stovetop or popcorn machine. Spread the sweet popcorn on a large tray. Carefully melt the dark chocolate in the microwave and drizzle onto the popcorn with a spoon. Follow the same directions with the milk chocolate and then the white chocolate. Allow to cool. Break into chunks and store in airtight container. ; name: fay s picnic cake ; ingredients: peaches, yellow cake mix, coconut, nuts, margarine ; preparation:In a 9 x 13 ungreased baking pan place the peaches and juice. Sprinkle the dry cake mix over the peaches. Sprinkle the coconut on top of the dry cake mix. Sprinkle the nuts on the top of the coconut. Drizzle the melted margarine evenly over the cake. Bake 350 degrees for 45-50 minutes until it is nicely browned. ; name: eggplant and diced tomatoes over angel hair ; ingredients: eggplant, diced tomatoes, fresh parsley, fresh basil, olive oil, salt and pepper, garlic powder, whole wheat angel hair pasta, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Coat a 13x9 inch pan with olive oil. Cube a medium sized eggplant and add to the pan. Add the diced tomatoes, parsley, basil, salt, pepper and garlic powder. Stir to coat. Cover with aluminum foil and bake for about 1 hour. Toss over angel hair pasta or thin spaghetti. ; name: spiced broccoli and tomatoes ; ingredients: fresh broccoli, tomatoes, gingerroot, red pepper, salt and pepper ; preparation:Separate the broccoli heads into small florets. Peel and slice the stems. Blanch the florets and stems in boiling salted water 3-4 minutes until crisp-tender. Drain thoroughly and set aside. Cut tomatoes lengthwise into eighths. Set aside. Stir-fry ginger for a few seconds. Add broccoli, tomatoes, and red pepper. Stir fry 2-3 minutes or till vegetables are heated through. Add 1-2 tbsp water and continue to stir fry for about 30 seconds. Serve hot, room temperature, or chilled. ; name: zucchini rounds side dish sandra lee semi homemade ; ingredients: zucchini, italian seasoning, extra virgin olive oil, parmesan cheese, salt, ground black pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 425. Spray a rimmed baking sheet with nonstick cooking spray. In a large bowl, combine zucchini, italian seasoning, olive oil, cheese, salt, and pepper. Spread zucchini in a single layer on prepared baking sheet. Bake for 8 to 10 minutes, turning once. Serve immediately. ; name: chicken supreme ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast halves, butter, fresh mushrooms, sour cream, cream of chicken soup, garlic salt, paprika, swiss cheese ; preparation:

name: oven fried vegetables ; ingredients: nonstick spray coating, fine dry breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, paprika, zucchini, onion, sweet red pepper, reduced-calorie italian dressing ; preparation:Spray a baking sheet with nonstick coating. Set aside. In a 9-inch pie plate stir together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, and paprika until well mixed. In a medium mixing bowl place the vegetable slices. Drizzle vegetables with salad dressing. Toss until coated. Place the coated vegetables in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet. Bake vegetables in a 450 degree oven for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: maple glazed barbcue chicken ; ingredients: maple syrup, tomato paste, red wine vinegar, salt, garlic clove, boneless skinless chicken breast halves, pepper ; preparation:Heat grill. In a small bowl, stir together all glaze ingredients. Sprinkle chicken with salt and pepper. Brush chicken generously with glaze. Place chicken on gas grill over medium or on charcoal grill 4 to 6 inches from medium coals. Cover grill. Cook 8-12 minutes or until juices run clear, turning once and brushing occasionally with glaze. ; name: pecan truffles ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, eggs, chocolate chips, pecans, pie crust ; preparation:Mix first 5 ingredients together. Unroll pie crust and cut into small rounds. Place in bottom of mini muffin pan. Put 1 teaspoons pecan and sugar mixture on each. Bake at 350f for 30 minutes. ; name: green beans with garlic butter ; ingredients: green beans, butter, garlic, pepper ; preparation:Cook beans according to package directions. In a separate bowl, combine butter, garlic and pepper. Drain beans. Place in serving bowl. Add butter mixture. Toss to coat evenly. Serve immediately. ; name: hot pepper butter ; ingredients: banana peppers, salt, white vinegar, water, sugar, flour, dry mustard, yellow mustard ; preparation:Seed, devein and grind peppers. Cover with vinegar, salt and water. Bring to a boil and simmer while you get the rest of the ingredients ready. Mix sugar, flour, dry mustard and yellow mustard. Add to pepper mixture. Stir well and cook until thick and bubbly. Fill jars, put on lids and turn upside down for 5 minutes then turn them right-side up and let them seal. ; name: cream of cauliflower and cheddar soup ; ingredients: butter, onion, cauliflower, condensed chicken broth, all-purpose flour, milk, cheddar cheese, pepper, parsley, crouton ; preparation:Melt butter in large saucepan, saute onion until tender. Stir in cauliflower and chicken broth. Cover, reduce heat and simmer 1215 minutes or until cauliflower is tender. Combine flour and milk. Add to saucepan. Cook and stir over medium heat until mixture boils and thickens. Remove from heat. Add cheese and stir until melted. Add pepper and parsley to taste. Serve with croutons. ; name: cilantro lime chicken ; ingredients: garlic, cilantro leaves, black peppercorns, sugar, limes, thai fish sauce, light soy sauce, sunflower oil, boneless skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Make the marinade of garlic, cilantro, ground peppercorns, sugar, lime juice, fish sauce, soy sauce and sunflower oil. Blend well. Place chicken breasts with marinade in a shallow dish or resealable plastic bag, coating them well, and set in the refrigerator at least 1 hour and no more than 2, turning them from time to time. Preheat a ridged griddle pan or heavy non-stick frying pan and cook the chicken for 7-8 minutes each side until the chicken is cooked through. Serve hot or cold, garnished with cilantro leaves. ; name: easy lemon mousse ; ingredients: double cream, lemon, juice of, lemon, zest of, sugar, low-fat cream cheese ; preparation:

name: n awlins praline kugel ; ingredients: eggs, cream cheese, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, vanilla extract, salt, wide egg noodles, pralines ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Mix together all ingredients excpet for the noodles and the pralines. Stir in cooked noodles gently. Pour into a greased 8 inch square casserole. Bake for 35 minutes. Sprinkle crumbled pralines on top and bake another 12 minutes. Let stand 10 minutes, then cut into squares. ; name: nick s famous fluffy rice and chicken casserole ; ingredients: cream soup, milk, long grain brown rice, mushrooms, dried onion flakes, chicken ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Mix soup and milk, reserving one cup. Pour remainder into ungreased 13x9 cake or casserole pan. Add rice, mushrooms and minced onion to the soup-milk, mixing well. Lay chicken pieces over rice-soup-milk mixture, pour reserved milk over the top of the chicken. Cover with foil, sealing edges tightly. Bake for one hour. Uncover and bake until golden & bubbly. ; name: jolly baby swiss spread ; ingredients: baby swiss cheese, mayonnaise, onion, fresh ground pepper, crisp bacon ; preparation:Chop baby swiss finely in food processor. Add mayonnaise, onion and pepper and process until smooth. Stir in bacon by hand. Spread in mini crock and refrigerate at least 1 hour before serving. Serve with breadsticks, crackers, french bread, apple or pears, or raw vegetables. ; name: skordalia potato and garlic dip ; ingredients: floury potatoes, garlic cloves, lemon juice, ground almonds, extra virgin olive oil, egg, sea salt, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Boil the potatoes in their skins until cooked - about 30 minutes. What you are aiming for in this recipe is starchy mashed potato. As soon as the potatoes are cool enough to handle, peel them and either mash them or put them through a potato ricer. Peel the garlic cloves and pound them in a pestle with the lemon juice or use a hand-blender for this step. Mix the potato, garlic and ground almonds together thoroughly in a bowl, and then beat in the olive oil gradually with a wooden spoon. Beat in the whole egg and season with salt and pepper. ; name: pasta with marinated tomatoes and mozzarella ; ingredients: beefsteak tomatoes, sweet onion, extra virgin olive oil, bocconcini, kosher salt, pepper, fettuccine, fresh basil ; preparation:In a large bowl, gently combine the tomatoes, onion, oil, bocconcini, salt, and pepper. Set aside and let marinate at room temperature for at least 10 minutes. Meanwhile, cook the pasta according to the package directions. Add the drained pasta and basil to the marinated tomatoes and toss to combine. Divide among individual bowls. The longer the tomato mixture marinates, the more flavorful it becomes. Keep it in the refrigerator for up to 2 days. Spoon it over chicken or warm bread. ; name: polenta crackers ; ingredients: boiling water, polenta, mixed herbs, salt, soy margarine ; preparation:Bring water to a boil. Add polenta and herbs, and cook until creamy. Remove from heat, and add salt and margarine. On a well-oiled cookie sheet, spread out batter until thin. Score into pieces with a sharp knife. Bake in a 350 degree oven 30-55 minutes, until crispy and brown. Cool and serve. ; name: crunchy nut pie pastry ; ingredients: nuts, salt, unbleached flour, butter, ice water ; preparation:Combine the nuts, salt and flour in a medium bowl or in a food processor fitted with the metal blade. Cut in the butter with a pastry blender. Drizzle in water and mix until dough holds a ball. St dough on a sheet of plastic wrap or waxed paper. Top with another sheet and roll into a circle. Fit into pie plate and fill. ; name: scallops in garlic cream sauce ; ingredients: scallops, butter, garlic cloves, parsley, scallions, white wine, salt, pepper, cream ; preparation:

name: karotten in bier gedunstet carrots in beer ; ingredients: carrots, butter, dark beer, salt, sugar ; preparation:Peel and slice carrots into long, thin slices. Melt butter in medium-size frypan. Add beer and carrots. Cook slowly until tender, stirring frequently. Stir in salt and sugar. Cook for another 2 minutes and serve hot. ; name: peanut butter rice crispy bars ; ingredients: crispy rice cereal, karo syrup, granulated sugar, peanut butter, chocolate chips, butterscotch chips ; preparation:Measure out rice crispies and set aside in large bowl. In saucepan combine sugar and karo. Bring just to simmer, then add the peanut butter and stir. Do not let the sugar mixture boil. Stir peanut butter mixture into rice crispies and stir quickly. It will start to harden immediately. Pour mixture into a 9x12 pan and flatten out evenly across pan. Combine chocolate and butterscotch chips into saucepan and melt over a double boiler and stir constantly. When melted pour over peanut butter mixture. Let it set. When set, cut into squares. ; name: mushroom alfredo ; ingredients: cream of mushroom soup, milk, red pepper, parmesan cheese, garlic, parsley, linguine ; preparation:In saucepan, combine soup, milk, red pepper, cheese, garlic and parsley. Bring to boil at medium heat, stirring often. Reduce heat and simmer for 5 mins. Pour sauce over noodles and sprinkle with pepper and additional cheese if desired. I usually increase the garlic to 2 plus cloves. ; name: white russian bundt cake ; ingredients: chocolate cake mix, chocolate flavor instant pudding and pie filling mix, butter, vodka, kahlua, half-and-half, powdered sugar ; preparation:Spray a 12 cup bundt pan. Combine all cake ingredients and beat until well mixed. Pour batter into prepared pan. Bake at 350 for 50-60 minutes or until done via toothpick test. Cool 15 minutes, remove from pan and cool completely. Combine glaze ingredients and beat on low speed until powdered sugar is moistened. Increase speed to medium and beat until creamy. Drizzle glaze over cooled cake. ; name: bob s scalloped potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, onions, green peppers, longhorn cheese, velveeta cheese, cream of mushroom soup, milk, salt and pepper ; preparation:Grease 13 x 9 pan. Alternately layer potatoes, peppers, onions and cheeses. Salt and pepper each layer until all ingredients are used. Mix soup and milk. Pour over top. Bake covered at 350 degrees for 1 hour, then uncover and bake until done. ; name: crumb topped tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, salt and pepper, butter, onion, dry breadcrumbs, parsley, thyme ; preparation:Cut tomatoes in half and arrange in shallow pan. Season with salt and pepper. Broil, cut side up 6 inches from heat for 5 minutes. In small skillet, cook onion in butter, until soft. Stir in rest of ing. Spoon onto tomatoes. Broil about 3 minutes longer -- until lightly browned. ; name: rosemary apricot chicken ; ingredients: salt, dried rosemary, black pepper, garlic cloves, chicken quarters, apricot jam, lemon juice, dijon mustard ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Mix salt, rosemary, pepper and garlic. Rub mixture into chicken. Place chicken, meaty side up, in pan and bake for 25 minutes. Meanwhile, mix apricot jam, lemon juice, and mustard. Brush apricot mixture over chicken. Bake for 20 minutes longer or until juices run clear. Serve. ; name: buddha s ultimately moist chocolate cookies ; ingredients: neufchatel cheese, butter, egg, vanilla extract, chocolate cake mix ; preparation:

name: ramen noodle coleslaw salad ; ingredients: chicken-flavored ramen noodles, cabbage, green onion, sesame seeds, vinegar, sugar, olive oil, salt, slivered almonds ; preparation:Break up noodles and place in colander. Pour boiling water over noodles, drain well, and mix with cabbage and onions. Mix 3 ramon seasoning packets with sesame seeds, vinegar, sugar, olive oil and salt. Pour over cabbage and noodle mixture. Refrigerate -- it gets better with time. Sprinkle almonds over salad before serving. ; name: white bean dip spread ; ingredients: cannellini beans, pesto sauce, lime juice, garlic clove, cumin, salt, parmesan cheese, extra virgin olive oil, whole grain baguette ; preparation:Preheat the broiler. Drain the beans and add to a food processor or blender. Add pesto, lime juice, garlic, cumin, salt, parmesan cheese, and 1 tablespoon of the olive oil and process or blend until smooth. Cut the baguette into 1-inch slices and brush the remaining tablespoons of olive oil over them, then broil on the lower rack until lightly browned. Put the toasted baguette slices on a platter. Scrape the spread into a nice bowl and set it in the middle of the platter and serve. ; name: tacos from scratch way better than a packet and just as easy ; ingredients: ground beef, tomato sauce, ground cumin, ground coriander, chili powder, garlic cloves, hot sauce, salt ; preparation:In a saute pan, brown ground beef. While beef is browning, combine the remainder of ingredients in a small bowl. Drain beef. Return to pan. Add the sauce. Stir, and add some water if desired. Simmer uncovered until meat reaches desired consistency. Serve on heated taco shells with cheese, sour cream, lettuce, tomatoes, olives, and hot sauce or however you prefer to use seasoned taco meat. ; name: quick stroganoff ; ingredients: butter, onion, ground beef, flour, salt, pepper, paprika, cream of mushroom soup, sour cream, noodles ; preparation:Cook noodles as directed, drain and set aside. Saute onoin in butter. Stir in groudn beef, flour, salt, pepper and paprika, saute for 5 minutes. Add soup and simmer for 10 minutes. Remove from heat, stir in sour cream. Serve over hot noodles. ; name: almost apple pie for one ; ingredients: apple, flour, cinnamon, nutmeg, splenda sugar substitute, light margarine ; preparation:Slice and core apple. Combine flour, spices & sweetener in bowl. Toss apple in dry mixture. Pour in pan. Drop margarine in dots on top. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes or until apples are soft. ; name: whipped butternut squash ; ingredients: butternut squash, margarine, light sour cream, salt and pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Slice top off butternut squash. Place whole squash in baking and bake in preheated oven for 1 hour. Let squash cool. Cut in half to scoop out seeds and remove skin. Place skinned squash into food processor with margarine and sour cream. Whip until smooth. Season with salt and pepper. ; name: lime salmon fillets ; ingredients: salmon fillets, dried thyme, salt, ground black pepper, butter, green onions, lime zest, lime ; preparation:Sprinkle the side of salmon fillets without skin with thyme, salt and pepper. In a skillet, melt butter at medium-high heat. Add salmon fillets, skin side up, and cook for about 4 minutes or until the bottom of fillets is lightly golden. Flip the salmon fillets and sprinkle with green onions and lime zest. Keep on cooking for 3 to 6 minutes or until the fish flakes easily with a fork. Serve with quarters of lime. ; name: savory breaded tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, fine breadcrumbs, parmesan cheese, chives, dried basil, butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:

name: honey lime tuna steaks ; ingredients: light olive oil, old bay seasoning, lime juice, honey, basil leaves, tuna steak ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients in shallow dish or self-closing plastic bag. Add tuna steaks. Turn to coat. Refrigerate 20 minutes. Turn occasionally. Grill or broil 8 to 10 minutes per inch of thickness. Discard leftover marinade. ; name: cherry orange cobbler ; ingredients: cherry pie filling, mandarin orange sections, all-purpose flour, granulated sugar, baking powder, salt, unsalted butter, egg, whole milk, cinnamon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400 degrees f. In medium saucepan, combine cherry pie filling & oranges, & bring to boil, then reduce heat to simmer & keep hot. Whisk together flour, sugar, baking powder & salt, then cut in butter until coarse. Whisk together the egg & milk, then add to flour mixture, stirring just to moisten. Pour hot filling into a 1. 5 or 2 quart baking dish. Immediately spoon on the biscuit topping in 6 mounds. Combine the 2 tablespoons of sugar & cinnamon, & sprinkle over the biscuits. Bake 20 minutes, until browned. Serve warm. ; name: lemon pizza ; ingredients: pizza dough, heavy cream, mozzarella cheese, ham, onion, fresh lemon juice, baby arugula, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Place a pizza stone on the floor or the lowest rack of your oven. Preheat the oven to 500 degrees f. Pat the pizza dough into a 12-inch diameter circle and place it on a peel. Spread on the heavy cream, then the mozzarella. Place the ham slices on evenly and scatter the onions over the top. Sprinkle the lemon juice over everything. Slide onto the stone and bake for 8 to 10 minutes. Cover the pizza with the baby arugula and grind on some black pepper. ; name: sole with pesto cream ; ingredients: sole fillets, salt and pepper, olive oil, butter, heavy cream, basil pesto, lemon peel ; preparation:Season both sides of sole with salt and black pepper. In a large skillet, heat oil and butter over medium high heat. Add sole and cook 1 to 2 minutes per side, until golden brown. In medium bowl whisk together heavy cream, pesto, and lemon zest. Add mixture to pan and bring to a simmer, until sauce thickens. Serve fish with rice and spoon sauce overall. ; name: roasted snap peas with shallots ; ingredients: sugar snap pea, shallot, extra virgin olive oil, salt, pepper, cooked bacon ; preparation:Preheat oven to 475 degrees f. Toss peas, shallot, oil, salt and pepper in a medium bowl. Transfer to a baking sheet and spread in a single layer. Roast in the oven, stirring once halfway through, until the peas are tender and beginning to brown slightly, 12 to 14 minutes. Serve warm, sprinkled with bacon if desired. ; name: anita s salsa picante ; ingredients: tomatoes, garlic, sweet onion, cilantro, jalapeno, tomatillo, ground cumin, cajun seasoning, hot sauce, fresh lime juice ; preparation:Chop in processor on pulse, slow. Chop onion first and tomatoes last. Add spices, juice. Be careful not to over-process. Drain to get excess water out. Serve alone with chips or as a condiment. ; name: easy chicken cordon bleu pockets ; ingredients: refrigerated reduced-fat crescent rolls, cooked chicken, ham, swiss cheese, egg ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Combine chicken, ham and cheese in a bowl. Separate dough into 8 rectangles. Firmly press perforations to seal well. Evenly divide mixture between rectangles. Pull up corners of rectangles to center and twist. Pinch edges to seal & place on a cookie sheet lined with foil and sprayed with olive oil spray. Brush pockets with egg & bake for about 20 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: the realtor s banana split salad ; ingredients: pineapple chunks, mandarin oranges, miniature marshmallows, sour cream, lettuce leaf, bananas, flaked coconut, maraschino cherries ; preparation:

name: poached whole chicken crock pot ; ingredients: whole chickens, thyme, rosemary, sage, parsley, salt, carrots, onion, celery, dry white wine ; preparation:Rub herbs and salt into cavity of chicken. Put vegetables in slow cooker. Truss chicken compactly and place in slow cooker. Add wine. Cover and cook on low 6-8 hours or on high for 4 hours. Serve hot with noodles or chill and slice. ; name: mama s beef a roni ; ingredients: ground beef, green pepper, onion, celery, garlic powder, italian seasoning, small shell pasta, mozzarella cheese, pasta sauce ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. Drain. While pasta is cooking, on medium heat brown ground beef in large skillet. Add onions, peppers, celery, italian seasoning and garlic powder, stirring until vegetables are tender. Drain and return to skillet. Stir in pasta sauce. Add pasta and mix thoroughly. Sprinkle cheese over top. Cover with lid and let cheese melt. Let sit for about 5 minutes then serve and enjoy. ; name: chocolate cream pound cake ; ingredients: whipping cream, eggs, vanilla, all-purpose flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, salt ; preparation:Preheat oven to 175 c. Grease an 8 x 4 inch loaf pan and dust with powdered sugar, shaking off excess. Whip the cream until stiff. Beat in eggs and vanilla. Sift together the remaining ingredients and add to the cream mixture. Stir to combine. Spoon batter into the prepared pan and bake in the preheated oven for 45-55 minutes, or until the cake just begins to pull from the edges of the pan. Cool the cake in the pan for 10 minutes before turning out on rack. The cake will keep in the fridge for up to a week wrapped air-tightly in plastic wrap and foil. ; name: koshari lentils and rice with tomato sauce ; ingredients: lentils, white rice, macaroni, onion, olive oil, garlic cloves, tomato sauce, crushed red pepper flakes ; preparation:Place lentils in saucepan with 4 cups of water and bring to a boil. Allow to simmer on low for 30 minutes, or until tender. Add rice to the lentils and cook for another 20 minutes or so, until rice is tender. Meanwhile, cook macaroni according to package directions to an al dente stage. Combine lentils, rice and macaroni in large pot. Saute onions and garlic in pan in olive oil until browned. Add tomato sauce to onions and garlic and heat until bubbling. Remove from heat. Place a serving of lentil mixture on a plate and cover with sauce. Sprinkle red pepper on top and serve. ; name: grandmother s chocolate peanut butter fudge ; ingredients: sugar, salt, corn syrup, cocoa, milk, butter, peanut butter, vanilla ; preparation:Combine first 5 ingredients, boil until soft ball stage. Remove from heat, then add butter and peanut butter. Stir around a few times and let cool slightly. Then add vanilla. Beat it and pour out onto buttered dish, or parchment covered dish. Cool, and cut into squares. ; name: ham cheese ball ; ingredients: cream cheese, mayonnaise, ham, parsley, dry onion, dry mustard, tabasco sauce ; preparation:Beat cream cheese and mayonnaise until smooth. Stir in remaining ingredients. Cover and chill several hours to blend flavors. Serve with assorted crackers. When chilled, you can shape into a ball, then roll in chopped walnuts to give an elegant appearance if serving to guests. Place on lettuce leaves or garnish with parsley sprigs. ; name: sherri s breakfast casserole ; ingredients: crescent rolls, hot sausage, onion, sliced mushrooms, cheddar cheese, mozzarella cheese, eggs ; preparation:Flatten rolls in bottom of greased 9x13 baking pan or casserole dish. Brown sausage and drain. Add onion and mushrooms to sausage and pour mixture over rolls. Add cheese on top of sausage. At this point you may continue or casserole may be refrigerated overnight. Beat eggs and pour on top and cover with foil. Bake at 350f for 40-45 minutes. Brown last 10 minutes. Remove from oven and let set 5 minutes. If you are freezing, allow casserole to cool and freeze. To bake, place in oven directly from freezer but allow about 50-60 minutes for baking. ; name: cantonese soup ; ingredients: lean pork, oil, soy sauce, pepper, ground ginger, chicken broth, chinese cabbage, chow mein noodles ; preparation:

name: quick easy cheddar garlic with pepperoni biscuit bites ; ingredients: cheddar garlic biscuit mix, pepperoni, dried basil leaves, red pepper, milk ; preparation:Heat oven to 400f. Spray cookie sheet with nonstick cooking spray or lightly grease. Combine biscuit mix, pepperoni, basil and red pepper in medium mixing bowl. Add milk. Stir until soft dough forms. Drop by heaping teaspoonfuls onto cookie sheet. Bake at 450f for 7 to 9 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: ham and bean soup ; ingredients: white beans, black beans, cooked ham, carrots, onion, herbs, pepper, low sodium chicken broth, fresh kale, parmesan cheese ; preparation:In crock pot, combine beans, ham, carrots, onion and pepper. Stir in undrained tomatoes and broth. Cover and cook on low for 6-8 hrs or high for 3-4 hours. Stir in kale or spinach just before serving. Sprinkle each serving with parmesan cheese, if desired. ; name: boston cream poke cake ; ingredients: yellow cake mix, french vanilla pudding mix, milk, chocolate frosting ; preparation:Make cake according to package instructions. Mix pudding mix with milk. Whisk until lumps are gone, about 2 minutes. Pudding should be pourable but not thin. While cake is still warm, poke holes in cake using a wooden spoon. Pour pudding over cake and gently press pudding into cake. Cool cake in the refrigerator. Remove foil from frosting. Microwave for 10-15 seconds and stir. Frosting should be pourable but not bubbly. Pour over cake and spread gently. ; name: oven fried vegetables ; ingredients: nonstick spray coating, fine dry breadcrumb, parmesan cheese, paprika, zucchini, onion, sweet red pepper, reduced-calorie italian dressing ; preparation:Spray a baking sheet with nonstick coating. Set aside. In a 9-inch pie plate stir together bread crumbs, parmesan cheese, and paprika until well mixed. In a medium mixing bowl place the vegetable slices. Drizzle vegetables with salad dressing. Toss until coated. Place the coated vegetables in a single layer on the prepared baking sheet. Bake vegetables in a 450 degree oven for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown. ; name: cranberry orange juice slushee ; ingredients: cranberries, water, sugar, cloves, orange juice, lemon juice ; preparation:Cook cranberries and water until skins pop open, about 5 minutes. Strain through cheesecloth. Bring juice to a boil and add sugar and cloves. Cook for 2 minutes. Cool. Add orange juice and lemon or lime juice. Chill thoroughly in freezer in desired glass. Garnish with fresh orange slices, if desired. ; name: italian sausage sweet 2 ; ingredients: pork butt, salt, fennel seeds, black pepper, sugar, water ; preparation:Put everything except minced meat into a big bowl. Stir to mix evenly. Put in minced meat and mix well. Shape into patties or stuff into casing. Freeze if you want to. ; name: linguini with bacon baby spinach and sage ; ingredients: whole wheat linguine, turkey bacon, onion, chicken broth, fresh sage leaves, spinach leaves, salt and pepper, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Cook pasta according to package directions. In a large skillet over medium heat, cook bacon to desired crispness. Add onion and saute until tender. Stir in chicken broth and sage, simmer 1-2 minutes. Add spinach and cook just until it wilts. Salt and pepper to taste. Toss linguini with sauce and serve sprinkled with parmesan. ; name: warm spinach and feta dip ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, garlic clove, baby spinach, feta, creme fraiche, salt & pepper ; preparation:

name: grapefruit orange medley salad ; ingredients: sugar, cornstarch, carbonated lemon-lime beverage, mandarin oranges, grapefruits, green seedless grapes ; preparation:In a small saucepan, mix sugar and cornstarch then whisk in soda until smooth. Bring to a boil and cook while stirring for 1 minute or until thickened. Cover and refrigerate until cool. In a large bowl, combine the oranges, grapefruit and grapes. Add the sauce and stir until fruit is coated. ; name: tangy braised cabbage ; ingredients: sunflower oil, shallots, cabbage, prepared horseradish, garlic clove, fresh ginger, sugar, white wine vinegar, fresh lemon juice, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:In a heavy saucepan, heat the sunflower oil over medium heat. Add the shallots, cabbage, horseradish, garlic and ginger and saute for 5 to 8 minutes, or until the cabbage starts to wilt. Stir in the sugar and cook to caramelize the cabbage lightly. Add the vinegar and lemon juice and stir to scrape up the browned bits from the bottom of the pan. Season with salt and pepper and serve immediately. ; name: great eastern s steamed mussels ; ingredients: fresh mussels, onion, garlic cloves, celery, olive oil, white wine, bay leaf, lemon peel, fresh parsley ; preparation:Rinse mussels in cold water and discard any broken or open mussels. Saute onion, garlic, celery and bay leaf in the oil in a large saucepan over medium heat for 1 minute. Add the mussels, wine, and cook for about 4-5 minutes until the mussels open. Shake the pot occasionally while cooking. Serve in soup plates, garnished with lemon peel, parsley, broth and crusty bread for dipping. Serves 4 as an appetizer or 2 as a main course. ; name: weight watchers ww strawberry mousse ; ingredients: strawberries, low-fat cream cheese, sugar-free strawberry jell-o gelatin dessert, egg whites ; preparation:Mix the strawberries with the cream cheese until the berries are slightly broken up and the cheese in pinky in hue. Make up the jello according to the packet and pour over the strawberry mix. Stir well and leave until just starting to set. Whisk the egg whites until stiff peaks and fold into the strawberry mix. Spoon the mix into glasses and chill for one hour. ; name: imitation lobster thermidor ; ingredients: cream of shrimp soup, imitation lobster meat, dry mustard, old bay seasoning, milk, sliced mushrooms, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Turn on broiler. Heat soup in a saucepan over low heat, stirring occasionally. Add next 5 ingredients and stir until heated through. Spoon into 4 lightly greased individual baking dishes or shells. Sprinkle with parmesan and a little more old bay. Broil 4 inches from heat source for 2-3 minutes until hot and bubbly. ; name: hpnotiq blue mojito ; ingredients: white rum, hpnotiq liqueur, simple syrup, lime wedges, mint leaves, soda water ; preparation:Muddle mint leaves, 1 lime wedge and simple syrup. Add ice, rum and hpnotiq. Shake. Pour into collins glass. Top with soda water. Garnish with lime wedge. ; name: garlic zucchini appetizer mutabbal koosa ; ingredients: olive oil, head of garlic, zucchini, vinegar, salt and pepper, green onions, cayenne, fresh cilantro ; preparation:Heat oil in a frying pan and saute garlic slices over medium heat until they turn light brown. Remove garlic slices with a slotted spoon and set aside. In the same oil, saute zucchini slices over medium heat until they turn light brown, turning them over once. Remove and drain on paper towels. Combine vinegar with remaining ingredients. Place zucchini on a serving platter. Sprinkle vinegar mixture over top. Then evenly top with garlic slices. Allow to stand for 4 hours or so before serving. ; name: oven chicken romano ; ingredients: whole chickens, butter, seasoned dry bread crumbs, romano cheese, parsley ; preparation:

name: weight watchers smothered chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken, salt and pepper, all-purpose flour, vegetable oil, fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, mushroom ; preparation:Salt and pepper chicken. Put flour in a medium-size bag and add pieces of chicken. Close the open end of the bag and shake. Flour will be evenly distributed on the meat. Heat oil in skillet. Place floured chicken in oil and brown on both sides. Add mushrooms and broth. Cover tightly with lid and simmer until meat is tender. Add additional water or broth if necessary. ; name: ranch style eggs ; ingredients: eggs, 6-inch tortillas, onion, cooking oil, garlic, tomatoes, green chilies, salt, cheese ; preparation:Heat 2 tbs oil in small skillet, hold tortilia with tongs, dip one at a time in oil, for ten seconds, or until limp. Line a 10x6x2 inch baking dish with the tortilias. Keep warm. In same skillet add 2tbs oil and cook onion and garlic till tender. Stir in tomatoes, green chillies, and salt. Simmer 10 min. Pour over tortilias. Beat eggs and cook in skillet till set, put on top, and grate cheese on top. Put in oven just long enough for cheese to melt. Serve warm. ; name: egg flower soup ; ingredients: chicken broth, eggs, dried chinese mushrooms, salt, msg, frozen peas ; preparation:Boil chicken broth, ginger and green onion 2 minutes. Add salt, msg, mushrooms and frozen peas. Cook 5 minutes. Pour soup slowly into serving bowl containing eggs. Stir gently. Serve hot. ; name: ww bbq chicken packets 5 pts serving ; ingredients: aluminum foil, barbecue sauce, frozen whole kernel corn, green pepper, skinless chicken breasts ; preparation:Spray one side of each sheet of foil. Lay four pieces of chicken on four sheets. Top with corn and green peppers and bbq sauce. Take other sheets of foil to enclose each to be a packet. Grill until done. Open and eat. ; name: goody cookies ; ingredients: graham crackers, butter, brown sugar, vanilla, pecans ; preparation:Line a jelly roll pan with foil. Arrange graham crackers in the pan in a single layer to cover pan. Combine butter and sugar in a heavy medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over medium heat, stirring occasionally. Boil for 2 minutes until the consistency of carmel. Stir in vanilla and chopped nuts. Drizzle the hot mixture over crackers and spread evenly. Bake 10 minutes at 300. Remove at once from pan to flat surface to cool. When cool, break into smaller pieces. ; name: coffee fizz ; ingredients: orange wedges, coffee liqueur, vanilla vodka, ginger ale ; preparation:Fill brandy sniffer or highball glass with ice. Squeeze one of the orange wedges over ice, twisting rind to release oil. Discard rind. Add coffee liqueur and vodka. Stir in ginger ale. Garnish with remaining orange wedges. ; name: garlic dill rice ; ingredients: minced garlic cloves, olive oil, rice, chicken broth, dill weed, salt, onion powder ; preparation:In a large skillet, saute garlic in hot olive oil until softened. Add rice and saute for 2 minutes over high heat. Add broth and seasonings and bring back to a boil. Lower heat, cover and simmer for 20 minutes or until done. Fluff and mix rice and allow to stand uncovered for a few minutes before serving. ; name: colorful pasta salad ; ingredients: broccoli floret, celery, black olives, red onion, ham, cheddar cheese, tri-color spiral pasta, italian dressing ; preparation:

name: hearty beef and rice supper ; ingredients: beef flavored rice-a-roni, butter, ground beef, celery, water, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Preheat skillet to 325f. Place butter into skillet to melt. Add dry rice mix into skillet and saut until vermicelli is golden brown, about 3 minutes. Add ground beef and celery. Cook, stirring occassionally, until beef is no longer pink. Reduce heat to 275f. Add water and rice seasoning packet. Stir until well mixed. Cover, and simmer for 15 minutes. Remove cover and stir. Sprinkle cheese over the entire mixture and continue cooking until cheese has melted, about 1 minute. ; name: shrimp in mustard sauce ; ingredients: butter, large shrimp, garlic clove, shallots, all-purpose flour, dry white wine, chicken broth, dijon mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt 1 tbs butter over medium high heat. Add the shrimp and garlic. Cook, tossing, until the shrimp starts to turn pink on the outside but is stil translucent on the inside, about 2 min. Transfer to a plate and set aside. Reduce the heat to medium and in the same skillet, melt the remaining butter. Add the shallot and cook until softened, 1-2 minute. Add the flour and cook for 30 secs, whisking constantly. Gradually add the wine, broth, and mustard - whisking constantly. Simmer until it is as thick as heavy cream, about 5 minute. Return the shrimp to the skillet. Bring to a simmer and cook until the shrimp are opaque throughout, about 2 minute. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: italian sausage and broccoli quiche ; ingredients: mild italian sausage, broccoli florets, italian cheese blend, eggs, heavy cream, black pepper, salt, rosemary, pie crusts ; preparation:Fry the sausage links in a skillet. When cooked through, slice thinly and set aside. Beat the eggs, cream, salt, pepper and rosemary in a bowl. Mix in the sausage, broccoli and cheese, stirring til all ingredients are coated. Pour into pie shell. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes, or until knife inserted in center comes out clean. ; name: ww 0 points cajun style stuffed mushrooms ; ingredients: olive oil flavored cooking spray, button mushroom, olive oil, onion, sweet red pepper, frozen chopped spinach, whole wheat bread, cajun seasoning, ground turmeric ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Lightl coat a jelly roll pan with cooking spray. Remove msuhroom stems from caps and finely chop them, reserving and setting aside caps. Heat oil in large skillet over high heat. Saute mushroom stems, onion, pepper and spainch until tender, about 5 minutes. Remove skillet from heat and stir in remaining ingredients until well-combined. Stuff each mushroom cap with 2 t. Of filling mixture. Place mushrooms, stuffed sides up, on jellyroll pan. Bake, uncovered, 15 minutes and serve warm. Points figured for 2 mushroomss per serving. ; name: quinoa with spinach and feta cheese ; ingredients: quinoa, extra virgin olive oil, garlic cloves, fresh spinach, onion, feta cheese ; preparation:Rinse the quinoa in a strainer. In a small saucepan, add the quinoa and 1 cup of water. Bring to a boil over high heat, then cover and reduce heat to simmer until water is absorbed, about 10-15 minutes. Meanwhile, heat a skillet over medium heat and add the olive oil and garlic and onion. Cook the garlic in the oil until the edges of the garlic turns very light brown, being careful not to burn the garlic. When the quinoa is done cooking, add it to the skillet along with the spinach. Stir it together until the spinach wilts. Add the crumbled feta cheese and stir to combine. Makes 2 servings. ; name: peach jalapeo chutney ; ingredients: peaches, jalapenos, ginger, sugar, ground cinnamon, lemon juice ; preparation:Peel and pit all peaches. Medium dice 3 peaches and place in bowl and set aside. Pure the remaining peaches in a blender. Pour mixture into a medium saucepan with jalapeos, ginger, sugar, cinnamon, and lemon juice. Bring pan to medium heat and reduce mixture, stirring occasionally, until thick for about 5 to 6 minutes. Pour diced peaches into saucepan and cook, stirring occasionally, for 3 minutes or until mixture is hot. Remove and set aside. ; name: sweet pasta for dinner or dessert ; ingredients: half-and-half, lemon, orange, honey, kosher salt, linguine, lemon juice, semisweet chocolate, hazelnuts ; preparation:Bring a large pot of salted water to a boil over high heat. In a large, heavy skillet heat the cream, zests, honey, and salt over medium heat, being careful not to boil the cream. Stir occasionally for about 4 minutes. Meanwhile, add the pasta to the pot of boiling water and cook until tender, stirring occasionally for 2-3 minutes. Drain the pasta and it to the skillet with the cream sauce. Add the lemon juice and stir to combine. Place the pasta in serving dishes. Shave chocolate directly on top pasta and sprinkle with hazelnuts, if desired. ; name: savory toast strips ; ingredients: white bread, butter, margarine, onion salt, garlic salt, corn flakes, parmesan cheese ; preparation:

name: siesta fiesta salad ; ingredients: black beans, sweet corn, sweet red pepper, red onion, red wine vinegar, olive oil, fresh parsley, fresh cilantro, fresh dill, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:In a colander, rinse the black beans. Drain well. In a large bowl, combine the beans, corn, sweet pepper, and onion. Set aside. In a screw-top jar, combine the vinegar, oil, parsley, cilantro, dill, and black pepper. Cover and shake well. Pour the dressing over the vegetable mixture and toss to coat. Serve at room temperature. Garnish the salad with a sprig of dill, if you like. Makes 4 servings. ; name: duck breasts with raspberry sauce ; ingredients: duck breasts, salt and pepper, raspberries, cinnamon, sugar, red wine vinegar, water ; preparation:Score the skin of the duck breasts, being careful not to cut into the meat. Season with salt and pepper on both sides, then place into a cold skillet, skin side down. Turn on the flame to medium-low, and slowly cook the duck until much of the fat has rendered out, and the skin begins to get crispy. Remove most of the rendered fat from the pan, and reserve for another use. Set the duck aside while the sauce cooks. In another small pan, combine the raspberries, cinnamon, sugar, vinegar, and water. Cook over medium low heat until the berries are soft and the sugar has dissolved. Place in a blender and puree until smooth. Return the duck to medium low heat, this time skin side up. Continue to cook until the meat reaches your desired degree of doneness.
