Serve at once or store in a ziploc bag up to 1 month. ; name: easy cheesy veggies ; ingredients: onion, summer squash, tomatoes, zucchini, red sweet bell pepper, oregano, tomato sauce, mozzarella cheese ; preparation:Combine vegetables in a baking dish. Sprinkle with oregano. Pour on tomato sauce. Bake uncovered in preheated 350 degree oven for 20 minutes. Top with mozzarella cheese and bake an additional 4 to 5 minutes, until cheese melts. ; name: easy fish tacos ; ingredients: frozen battered fish fillets, packaged coleslaw mix, cilantro, lime, flour tortillas, mayonnaise, russian salad dressing, avocado, pico de gallo ; preparation:Prepare fish filets or fish sticks according to package directions. Separate 6 tortillas on a plate and microwave till warm, aprox. 30 seconds. Combine coleslaw and cilantro. Sprinkle the juice of the lime over coleslaw and toss. Mix mayo and russian dressing for the sauce. Serve with pico de gallo and sliced avocado. Assemble and enjoy. ; name: ragu chili mac ; ingredients: olive oil, green bell pepper, ground beef, pasta sauce, chili powder, elbow macaroni ; preparation:In 12-inch nonstick skillet, heat olive oil over medium-high heat and cook green bell pepper, stirring occasionally, 3 minutes. Add ground beef and brown, stirring occasionally. Drain. Stir in ragu pasta sauce and chili powder. Bring to a boil over high heat. Reduce heat to low and simmer covered 10 minutes. Stir in macaroni and heat through. Serve, if desired, with sour cream and shredded cheddar cheese. ; name: crock pot jerked chicken sandwiches ; ingredients: jamaican jerk spice, boneless skinless chicken thighs, green peppers, onion, chicken broth, ketchup, hoagie rolls ; preparation:Rub jerk seasoning generously over chicken thighs. Place pepper and onion in bottom of crock pot. Place chicken over vegetables. In a small bowl, combine broth and ketchup. Mix well. Pour broth mixture over chicken. Cover. Cook on low for 6-8 hours. Remove chicken from crock pot and shred. Return to crock pot and mix well. With a slotted spoon place chicken mixture into buns. ; name: baked eggs oamc ; ingredients: bread, mild cheddar cheese, ham, bell pepper, onion, eggs, milk ; preparation:Mix bread, cheese, ham, bell pepper and onion. Spread in a 13x9x2 inch baking dish treated with nonstick spray. Whisk eggs and milk, and pour over top. Cover dish with foil and freeze. To prepare for serving, thaw dish, and bake uncovered in a preheated 375 oven for 45 minutes. ; name: hot mexican potato salad ; ingredients: tiny new potatoes, picante sauce, lime juice, olive oil, salt, pepper, roma tomato, black olives, green onions, fresh cilantro ; preparation:

name: cranberry orange and dark chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: flour, baking powder, baking soda, salt, butter, white sugar, egg, orange, zest of, dried cranberries, dark chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f and line a couple of baking sheets with parchment paper. In a medium bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda and salt. In a large bowl, cream together the butter and the sugar, beating with an electric mixer until light. Beat in the egg and orange zest. With the mixer on low speed, gradually add in the flour mixture, stirring only until just combined. Stir in the cranberries and chocolate chips. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets and bake for 9-12 minutes, until the edges are very lightly browned. Cool for 3-4 minutes on baking sheet then transfer to a wire rack to cool completely. ; name: sauted kale red onions with garlic and lemon ; ingredients: kale, boiling water, olive oil, garlic cloves, red onion, soy sauce, lemon juice ; preparation:Tear the leaves off the kale into bite-size pieces. Slice the stems into 1 inch long pieces. Blanch the stems for 2 to 3 minutes. Remove, place in a strainer, quickly rinse under cold water to halt cooking. Blanch the kale leaves for 1 to 2 minutes, and rinse in a strainer under cold water. Drain. Heat the oil in a medium skillet and saut the garlic for 1 minute. Saute the onions for 2 to 3 minutes. Add the kale leaves, stems and shoyu soy sauce. Saut for 2 to 3 minutes, stirring constantly. Sprinkle the lemon juice over and toss to mix. Serve immediately after adding the lemon juice or the leaves may loose their bright green color. ; name: greek pork pockets ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, caesar salad dressing, canola oil, pita breads, cucumber, red onions, ranch salad dressing ; preparation:Place the pork in a large resealable plastic bag. Add ceaser dressing. Seal bag and turn to coat. In a large nonstick skillet, saute pork in oil for 7-8 minutes or until juices run clear. Fill each pita half with pork, cucumber, and onion. Drizzle with cucmber dressing. ; name: dijon potato salad ; ingredients: new potatoes, white wine vinegar, dijon mustard, olive oil, parsley, salt & pepper ; preparation:Place a steamer basket in a saucepan filled with one-inch of water. Bring to a gentle boil. Add potatoes. Cover and cook just until tender, 15-20 minutes. Tossing occasionally. In a serving bowl, combine vinegar and dijon. Season with salt and pepper. Add hot cooked potatoes. Toss. Let cool, tossing occasionally. Add oil and parsley to cooled potato mixture. Season with salt and pepper, and toss. ; name: spanish burger ; ingredients: ground chuck, salt & freshly ground black pepper, manchego cheese, serrano ham, olive oil ; preparation:Preheat grill on high heat. Lay out ground chuck in a single layer and season well with salt and pepper. Divide chuck into four portions. Wrap each piece of manchego in a 4-inch square piece of ham. Heat oil in a frying pan over medium heat. Add each ham-and-cheese bundle and fry, turning, until ham is crisped and cheese is beginning to melt. Allow to cool slightly, fold meat around each bundle to form hamburgers about 1 inch thick. Grill burgers for about 4 to 5 minutes a side or until just cooked through. ; name: frazipan danish almond cake ; ingredients: almond paste, sugar, butter, eggs, cake flour ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Grate the almond paste. Add butter and sugar, mix well. Add eggs gradually, stir with whisk until fully incorporated. Use a spatula to fold in the flour. Pour cake batter into a 10-inch tart pan, bake for 30 minutes or until toothpick inserted comes out clean. Sprinkle powdered sugar or top with fruits. ; name: chicken salsa tacos ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, water, taco seasoning, salsa, sharp cheddar cheese, light sour cream, tortillas, lettuce, tomatoes ; preparation:Spray a large frying with cooking spray then cook the chicken until no longer pink. Mix in the water, taco seasoning, & salsa, simmer for 5 minutes. Add in the cheese then stir until melted. Turn off the heat & stir in the sour cream. Spoon the chicken onto the tortilla shells, top with the tomato & lettuce, if using. ; name: classic hummus my way ; ingredients: chickpeas, olive oil, lemon juice, garlic, cumin, ground red pepper, salt, garlic powder, onion powder, water ; preparation:

name: fresh and sun dried tomato salad with parmesan ; ingredients: tomatoes, salt, fresh ground black pepper, sun-dried tomato packed in oil, balsamic vinegar, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Arrange the tomatoes in a single layer on 4 salad plates. Season to taste with salt and pepper. Scatter the sun-dried tomatoes over the fresh tomato slices. Drizzle with oil and vinegar. Use a vegetable peeler to shave the cheese over the salad. ; name: raisin and bran muffins ; ingredients: wheat bran, milk, egg substitute, canola oil, unbleached white flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, raisins ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 400f. Combine the wheat bran and milk in a mixing bowl. Let stand 2 minutes or until most of the moisture is absorbed. Add the egg and oil. Beat until well blended. Sift together the flour, sugar, baking powder and salt. Add the dry ingredients to the bran mixture and stir just until all are moistened. Fold in raisins, but do not over mix. Spoon the batter into oiled muffin cups and bake 25 minutes or until lightly browned. Serve hot. ; name: quick party pitcher ; ingredients: frozen limeade concentrate, apple juice, ginger ale, ice, maraschino cherry ; preparation:In a large pitcher combine limeade and apple juice. Shake vigorously. Add ginger ale. Put ice in glasses, pour in mixture. Top with maraschino cherries. ; name: healthy holiday hummus ragu ; ingredients: garbanzo beans, rag pasta sauce, feta cheese, fresh cilantro, canola oil, olive oil, lime, corn tortillas, salt, pepper ; preparation:Place 2 cups garbanzo beans in a food processor. Press for 30 seconds, add olive oil, lime juice, salt. Continue pressing until smooth hummus consistency. Heat a skillet and add ragu sauce until warm. Place on a bowl. Using the same skillet, add canola oil and rest of whole garbanzo beans and heat until crisp. Assemble the hummus by placing garbanzo dip first, ragu sauce, crispy garbanzo beans on top. Sprinkle cilantro, lime, feta cheese, salt and pepper. Serve with tortilla chips. ; name: homemade enchilada sauce ; ingredients: oil, cornstarch, chili powder, chicken broth, tomato sauce, salt, cumin, oregano, sugar, cayenne ; preparation:Heat oil with cornstarch in saucepan over medium heat. Cook for 1 minute. Add in chili powder and cook for another minute. Gradually stir in the broth, mixing well with a whisk to make sure you get out the lumps. Stir in the remaining ingredients. Simmer until thickened on low. ; name: ww raspberry balsamic chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, flour, low-fat chicken broth, cornstarch, low-sugar raspberry preserves, balsamic vinegar ; preparation:Cut chicken into bite sized pieces. Salt and pepper to taste. Dredge in flour, shaking excess flour from the meat. Cook chicken in a nonstick skillet or wok on medium heat approximately 15 minutes. Remove chicken from skillet. Mix broth, cornstarch and preserves in skillet over medium heat. Stir in vinegar. Add chicken. Cook approximately 10 minutes, turning after 5. ; name: pickled beetroot ; ingredients: beetroots, vinegar, water, sugar, peppercorn, clove, bay leaf, mustard seeds, cinnamon stick, salt ; preparation:Wash the beetroot well, and cook in boiling salted water until tender. Strain and cool beetroot and remove skins. Slice beetroot into julienne strips and set aside. Place all pickling ingredients into a pan and bring to boil when boiling bring back mixture to a simmer for about 5 minutes and then strain mixture. Spoon beetroot into hot sterilized jars, and top with the vinegar mixture. Seal jars, and store in a cool place. ; name: rava semolina ladoo ; ingredients: rava, sugar, ghee, milk, green cardamoms, saffron strands, coconut flakes ; preparation:

name: jamaican pumpkin soup ; ingredients: onion, pumpkin, chicken stock, scotch bonnet pepper, scallions, garlic cloves, bay leaf, fresh thyme, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:Saut onions in butter in a large pot until transparent. Add pumpkin and fill with stock. Add the remaining ingredients and bring to boil. Simmer for about half an hour or to desired consistency. Remove scotch bonnet pepper and serve hot. ; name: butterscotch peanut butter bars squares ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, salt, peanut butter, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and melted butter. Add vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. In a separate bowl, sift flour, powder, and salt. Add dry mixture into wet mixture. Spread into a greased glass baking dish. Cook in oven until golden, 15-18 minutes. In a microwave safe bowl, heat peanut butter and cream on low heat. Stir until smooth, and spread over baked bars. Cool slightly and cut into bars. ; name: dark rye and whole wheat bread ; ingredients: whole wheat flour, rye flour, wheat gluten, cocoa, yeast, caraway seed, salt, water, splenda sugar substitute, natural applesauce ; preparation:Add yeast to 1 cup of warm water and dissolve. Combine all remaining ingredients. Add yeast mixture. Knead for about 5 minutes. Cover tightly and let rise on warm stovetop for about 45 minute until doubled. Pour into two loaf pans sprayed with cooking spray. Cover and let rise again for an additional 45 minutes. Bake for 30 minutes at 350. Yummy. ; name: crab haddock bake ; ingredients: haddock fillet, ritz crackers, lump crabmeat, butter ; preparation:Heat oven to 350f. Place the crackers in ziploc bag and crush them. Melt half the butter and mix the crumbs, crab and butter in small bowl. Put stuffing in shallow dish. Cut fish into 4 equal parts and arrange them over the haddock. Dot with remaining butter and season with salt and pepper. Bake 20 minutes. For extra zest, add some lemon juice to the stuffing. ; name: barbecue prawn ; ingredients: king prawns, garlic, gingerroot, green chili peppers, turmeric powder, red chili powder, salt ; preparation:Clean and devein prawns. Add turmeric powder, salt, mix and set aside. Grind together green chilies, garlic, ginger, and red chili powder. Add the prawns from step 1, mix thoroughly and set aside for 30 minutes. 3barbeque in a charcoal fired grill or oven. Preheat the oven to 350 deg. Put prawns in skewers. Keep the skewers on the separator in the oven. Place a tray below the separator. Bake at 350 deg for 10 to 15 minutes. Serve hot. ; name: ham balls in sauce ; ingredients: ground ham, ground pork, ground beef, eggs, milk, graham cracker crumbs, tomato soup, vinegar, brown sugar, mustard ; preparation:Mix ham ball ingredients together. I use a stand mixer, but this can be done by hand. Form mixture into large meatballs. Place in a 9x13 pan. Combine sauce ingredients and pour over meatballs in pan. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees for 1 hour. If desired, spoon some of the sauce over the meatballs a couple times as they bake to keep the tops moist. ; name: delicious fish cakes ; ingredients: egg, fresh lemon juice, onion, prepared mustard, seasoning salt, dried parsley flakes, fish fillet, corn flake crumbs, butter, oil ; preparation:Combine egg, lemon juice, onion, mustard, salt, pepper and parsely. Toss with fish. Add enough cornflake crumbs to bind together. Shape fish into cakes. Roll each cake in remaining cornflake crumbs to coat the outside. Melt butter with 1 tbsp oil in frypan. Add fish cakes. Cook until crisp and browned. Transfer to heated platter, or keep in warm oven until ready to serve. If desired, recipe can be doubled to feed more people. ; name: braised chicken with red potatoes and tarragon broth ; ingredients: olive oil, shallot, chicken breast halve, reduced-sodium fat-free chicken broth, dry white wine, fresh tarragon, salt, fresh ground black pepper, red potatoes, fresh flat-leaf parsley ; preparation:

name: kielbasa and potato bake ; ingredients: condensed cream of mushroom soup, onion, milk, kielbasa, salt, ground black pepper, russet potatoes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a large mixing bowl, mix together soup, onion, milk, garlic, salt and pepper. Stir, in potatoes and kielbasa. Spoon into a 7x11 inch casserole dish. Place casserole on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 90 minutes or until potatoes are tender. ; name: grouper parmesan ; ingredients: grouper fillets, sour cream, parmesan cheese, lemon juice, onion, salt, liquid hot pepper sauce, paprika, fresh parsley ; preparation:Skin fillets if necessary and cut into serving size pieces. Place in a well-greased baking dish. Combine sour cream, parmesan cheese, lemon juice, onion, salt and liquid hot pepper sauce. Spread mixture over the fish. Sprinkle with paprika. Bake at 350 degrees f. For 25 to 30 minutes or until fish flakess easily when tested with a fork. Garnish with parsley. ; name: overnight egg casserole ; ingredients: frozen hash brown potatoes, cooked ham, monterey jack cheese, cheddar cheese, eggs, egg substitute, evaporated milk, pepper, dijon mustard, salsa ; preparation:Spray an 8-inch square baking dish with non-stick cooking spray. Layer the hash browns, ham and cheeses. In a large bowl, whisk together the eggs, egg substitute, milk, pepper and dijon mustard. Pour over the casserole, cover and refrigerate overnight. Remove the casserole from the refrigerator 30 minutes before baking. Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Uncover the casserole and bake for 1 hour or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Allow to stand for 5 to 10 minutes before cutting into squares. Serve with salsa on top. ; name: the creamiest pepper parmesan dressing ; ingredients: sour cream, mayonnaise, parmesan cheese, garlic, salt, fresh coarse ground black pepper, buttermilk, red wine vinegar, fresh parsley, feta cheese ; preparation:In small bowl, combine sour cream, mayonnaise and parmesan cheese and set aside. Mash garlic and salt together until it forms a paste. Add to sour cream mixture along with black pepper. Whisk in remaining ingredients. Store covered, in refrigerator. ; name: zee s malaysian chicken curry ; ingredients: potatoes, chicken breasts, salt & pepper, onion, curry powder, salt and pepper, coconut milk, oil ; preparation:Boil potatoes until half cooked. When they are cooked, drain water, and heat the pan with 3 tablespoons oil and fry the potatoes for about 5 minutes. Set aside. Marinate chicken well with salt & pepper. While marinate chicken, heat pan and fry onion until soft. Add salt and curry powder and stir them well. Add the chicken in and stir, then add coconut milk and stir well. Add potatoes. Simmer for about 15 minutes or so, make sure chicken and potatoes are cooked. Taste it and add more salt and pepper or curry powder if you need. Serve with rice. ; name: sweet sour crock pot turkey meatballs ; ingredients: ground turkey, dry breadcrumbs, fresh parsley, onions, egg, jellied cranberry sauce, ketchup, chili sauce ; preparation:Combine turkey, bread crumbs, parsley, onion and egg in a large bowl. Mix well and shape into 24 meatballs. In a 6 quart. Slow cooker, mix cranberry sauce, ketchup and chili sauce. Carefully add the meatballs, coating them with the sauce mixture. Put the lid on and cook on low for 8-10 hours. ; name: black white and red all over vegetarian tacos ; ingredients: black beans, white corn, rotel, tortilla, sour cream ; preparation:Drain and rinse black beans. Drain corn and tomatoes. Mix beans, corn and tomatoes in pan and heat until heated throughout. Serve on tortillas with any additional toppings desired. Mixture can also be heated in microwave. ; name: spanish rice casserole ; ingredients: bulk sausage, rice, onion, chicken stock, diced tomatoes, chili powder, garlic powder, pepper ; preparation:

name: beer marinated flank steak ; ingredients: soy sauce, olive oil, garlic cloves, dijon mustard, fresh rosemary, worcestershire sauce, fresh coarse ground black pepper, lager beer, flank steaks ; preparation:Whisk first 7 ingredients in medium bowl, then whisk in beer. Pour marinade into large resealable plastic bag. Add steaks, seal bag, and chill 1 day, turning bag occasionally. Grill over medium-high heat for 5 minutes per side for medium rare. Alternatively, place steaks in hot grill pan or skillet and cook until well browned and thermometer inserted into center registers 125f to 130f for medium-rare, about 5 minutes per side. Transfer steaks to carving board and let rest 5 minutes. Slice steaks thinly across grain. Arrange on platter. Spoon any accumulated juices over and serve. ; name: shrimp and asparagus with angel hair pasta ; ingredients: angel hair pasta, olive oil, yellow pepper, asparagus spear, medium shrimp, green onions, lemons, zest of, lemon juice, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Prepare pasta as directed on package. Meanwhile, in large skillet, in 2 tbsp. Olive oil, saute bell pepper and blanched asparagus spears. Add shrimp and cook until shrimp just turns pink. Toss shrimp mixture with prepared pasta. Add remaining olive oil, green onions, lemon zest and lemon juice. Sprinkle hot pasta with fresh, grated parmesan cheese. Serve immediately. ; name: habit forming shrimp dip ; ingredients: cream of shrimp soup, cream cheese, baby shrimp, garlic salt ; preparation:Mix softened cream cheese with soup. Pat excess water from thawed shrimp. Chop into small pieces. Add to cheese mixture, blend in garlic salt. Serve with veggies or crackers. ; name: banana coconut bread ; ingredients: sugar, butter, eggs, mashed banana, shredded coconut, flour, baking powder, salt, baking soda, pecans ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350 degrees. Mix the sugar, butter and eggs together and then beat the mixture until light and fluffy. Add the mashed bananas and coconut and stir. Sift the flour with the baking powder, salt, and soda. Stir this into the other mixture, string until smooth. Add the nuts if desired and stir again. Pour the batter into a greased 9 by 5 by 3 inch loaf pan. Bake in a 350 degree oven for 60 to 70 minutes or until the loaf tests done. ; name: town house chicken ; ingredients: boneless chicken breasts, cracker, parmesan cheese, parsley, egg ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Cut fat off chicken and cut in half. Crush crackers into tiny pieces and them mix with cheese and parsley. Dredge chickens in egg, then in the cracker mix. Lightly fry in skillet. And then bake for 25 minutes. ; name: darrell s zingy pork chops ; ingredients: center-cut pork chops, barbecue sauce, orange marmalade, ground ginger, garlic powder ; preparation:Preheat oven to 400f. Place chops in 8-inch square baking dish. Combine sauce, marmalade, ginger and. Garlic powder. Spoon evenly over chops. Bake 45 minutes or until chops are cooked through. ; name: zucchini bread plain ; ingredients: unbleached flour, splenda sugar substitute, baking powder, salt, egg white, eggs, canola oil, zucchini ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees f. Spray 2 loaf pans with non stick coating. In a large bowl, mix flour, splenda, baking powder, and salt. In a separate bowl mix together the eggs and egg whites, canola oil, and the grated zucchini. Stir the liquid mixture into the flour mixture. The dough will be somewhat thick. Stir until the flour mixture is just moistened. Spread evenly into the loaf pans. Bake 50 minutes. ; name: arugula pear and parmesan salad ; ingredients: pears, lemon juice, hazelnut oil, arugula, parmesan cheese, fresh ground black pepper, blue cheese, walnuts ; preparation:

name: lime honey glazed chicken ; ingredients: cinnamon, chicken, honey, dry sherry, fresh lime juice, garlic clove, salt, pepper ; preparation:Sprinkle cinnamon over chicken and arrange in a 12 by 8 inch baking dish. In a small bowl, combine remaining ingredients. Pour over chicken pieces. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator for at least 3 hours, turning pieces occasionally. Preheat oven to 350. Bake 50 minutes, basting with pan juices. ; name: delicious soft chocolate chip cookies ; ingredients: butter, brown sugar, granulated sugar, egg, vanilla extract, all-purpose flour, cornstarch, baking soda, chocolate ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. Cream together butter and sugars until creamy. Add egg and vanilla. Blend well. In another bowl combine flour, cornstarch and baking soda. Add to butter mixture and then add chocolate chunks. Drop by tablespoons onto a greased baking sheet and bake for 8-10 minutes, until golden brown around the edges. ; name: roast lime chicken ; ingredients: chicken legs, limes, balsamic vinegar, olive oil ; preparation:Joint the chicken legs and slash the skin of each piece of chicken a couple times, so the marinade can be easily absorbed. Mix the juice of one lime together with the vinegar and olive oil. Smear this over the chicken and leave for up to 30 minutes, turning a couple times. Place the chicken in a lightly oiled dish and pour over the marinade. Bake at 400f or 200c for 30-40 minutes, basting occasionally. Turn once, halfway through. During the last 10 minutes of cooking, halve the two remaining limes and arrange them around the chicken. ; name: soft as wonder white bread ; ingredients: water, salt, margarine, honey, all-purpose flour, powdered milk, sugar, bread machine yeast ; preparation:Add ingredients in order given. Select dough cycle. When done, take out dough and on a floured surface, shape into loaf and place in loaf pan. Let rise in a warm place for approximately 40 minutes until doubled in size. Bake on centre rack of preheated 350 degree oven for 25-30 minutes. Cool on wire rack before slicing. ; name: butterscotch peanut butter bars squares ; ingredients: brown sugar, butter, eggs, vanilla extract, flour, baking powder, salt, peanut butter, heavy cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees f. In a large bowl, cream brown sugar and melted butter. Add vanilla and eggs 1 at a time. In a separate bowl, sift flour, powder, and salt. Add dry mixture into wet mixture. Spread into a greased glass baking dish. Cook in oven until golden, 15-18 minutes. In a microwave safe bowl, heat peanut butter and cream on low heat. Stir until smooth, and spread over baked bars. Cool slightly and cut into bars. ; name: jamaican pumpkin soup ; ingredients: onion, pumpkin, chicken stock, scotch bonnet pepper, scallions, garlic cloves, bay leaf, fresh thyme, salt and pepper, butter ; preparation:Saut onions in butter in a large pot until transparent. Add pumpkin and fill with stock. Add the remaining ingredients and bring to boil. Simmer for about half an hour or to desired consistency. Remove scotch bonnet pepper and serve hot. ; name: homemade sun dried tomato paste ; ingredients: sun-dried tomatoes packed in oil, garlic, olive oil, salt & freshly ground black pepper ; preparation:Put the tomatoes in a medium bowl. Add some very hot water to cover. Stir for a few minutes, then drain. In a food processor, combine the tomatoes, garlic, olive oil and seasonings. Puree until smooth. Refrigerate for up to 2 weeks. ; name: turkish apricot compote kayisi kompostosu ; ingredients: fresh apricots, sugar, water, almond extract, almonds ; preparation:

name: jalapeno popper grilled cheese sandwich ; ingredients: jalapeno peppers, sourdough bread, butter, cream cheese, colby-monterey jack cheese, tortilla chips ; preparation:Place the peppers on a baking sheet with the cut side facing down. Place the baking sheet on the top shelf in the oven and broil until the outer layer of the skin has blackened, about 8-14 minutes. Place the peppers in a zip-lock bag or other sealable container, seal and let them cool until you can handle them, about 20 minutes. Remove the skins from the peppers. The skins should easily pinch off. Assemble sandwich by spreading the cream cheese on the inside of one piece of bread. Layer with roasted jalapeno peppers and shredded cheese. Top with the second bread slice and spread with the softened butter the outersides of the bread slices. Sprinkle over both sides with crushed chips. Preheat a skillet and grill until golden brown and the cheese has melted, about 2-3 minutes per side. ; name: eggs and ham breakfast bake ; ingredients: cooked ham, cheddar cheese, hash brown potatoes, bell pepper, mushrooms, eggs, small curd cottage cheese, black pepper, milk ; preparation:Heat oven to 350. Spray bottom of baking dish with cooking spray, sprinkle three cups of the has browns in bottom of dish. Layer with ham cheese, bell peppers and mushrooms. Sprinkle remaining potatoes on top. Beat eggs and milk with wire wisk, add cottage cheese and pepper. Pour over mixture in baking pan. Bake 45 min or until golden brown and set in the center. ; name: glorious chicken ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breasts, margarine, water, ritz cracker crumbs, parmesan cheese, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, mushrooms ; preparation:Roll chicken breasts first in the margarine, then in the crumb mixture. Place in a 9x13 pan sprayed with non-stick cooking spray. Mix soup, mushrooms, water, and sour cream. Pour this mixture over the chicken. Sprinkle with remaining crumbs and drizzle on any leftover margarine. Bake at 350 for one hour or until done. ; name: bailey s banana vanilla thrilla ; ingredients: baileys irish cream, coconut milk, banana, shredded coconut, yellow food coloring, ice cubes, vanilla ice cream, sugar ; preparation:Add all liquids in blender with banana and ice cream. Blend until smooth. Add ice and sugar, and pulse until a smoothie consistency is reached. Garnish with coconut. Makes 2-3 500ml servings. For a fancier garnish, use the head of a tropical flower. ; name: peaches and cream alcoholic drink ; ingredients: vodka, cream, peach schnapps, ice, peaches ; preparation:Cut a wedge out of one of the peaches to use as a garnish. Peel the peaches and cut out the pits. Pour all ingredients into a blender. Blend well at high speed. Pour into glasses and garnish with the peach wedge. ; name: roast pork and apple dinner ; ingredients: pork chops, onion, sliced mushrooms, balsamic vinaigrette, minute white rice, condensed chicken broth, water, red apples, dried thyme leaves ; preparation:Spray large nonstick skillet with cooking spray. Add chops. Cook on medium-high heat 4 minutes on each side or until browned. Add onion, mushrooms and dressing. Cook an additional 3 minutes. Stir in rice, broth, water, apples and thyme. Reduce heat to medium. Simmer 10 minutes or until heated through. ; name: almost shrimp newburg ; ingredients: shrimp, flour, clam juice, evaporated milk, half-and-half, sherry wine, salt and pepper, mozzarella cheese, cracker, butter ; preparation:Place evaporated milk and flour in a pot and heat and stir until thickened. Add half and half, clam juice, and sherry and continue to stir until smooth and thickened. Stir in salt, pepper, and cheese and stir until smooth. Place shrimp in the bottom of a casserole and pour sauce over. Crush crackers and mix with butter. Sprinkle crackers over sauce and shrimp and bake at 350 degrees until bubbly. You can omit the crackers and bake til bubbly then serve over rice. ; name: lemon poppy seed bread ; ingredients: lemon cake mix, eggs, vegetable oil, instant lemon pudding, water, poppy seed ; preparation:

name: fried tofu with sweet and sour dipping sauce ; ingredients: fried tofu, seasoned rice vinegar, sugar, salt, red pepper flakes, peanuts, fresh cilantro ; preparation:In a small saucepan, heat water over medium high heat. Once water begins to boil, add the tofu. This will rinse the frying oil off and bring the tofu to room temperature. Boil for 3-5 minutes. Remove tofu from the water and drain the saucepan. Place tofu on a towel to dry. Return the saucepan to the stove and add the vinegar, sugar, and salt to it. Simmer until it reaches a slightly syrupy consistency, stirring often. Remove from heat and add remaining ingrediants. Serve in a small dipping bowl alongside tofu. ; name: jalapeno pepper appetizers ; ingredients: jalapeno peppers, cream cheese, cooked bacon, cheddar cheese ; preparation:Cut jalapeno peppers in half lengthwise. Remove seeds and membranes. Rinse. Place one heaping teaspoon of cream cheese on each pepper half. Place peppers on baking sheet. Lined with alumninum foil. Sprinkle with bacon and cheddar cheese. Bake at 350 degrees for 20-25 minutes. Serve immediately. ; name: sarah s beef enchiladas with chicken soup ; ingredients: hamburger, green chilies, refried beans, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, onions, cheddar cheese, flour tortilla, salt, pepper ; preparation:Brown the hamburger. Drain off fat, mix in chillies and re-fried beans. Heat and then set aside. Mix soup, sour cream and onion together, heat on medium heat until mixed thoroughly. Add enough of the soup mixture to lightly cover the bottom of a greased 9x13 inch pan. Place a scoop of meat and scoop of soup mixture in each tortilla, sprinkle cheese on top. Place in baking dish. Repeat until dish is full. Pour remaining soup mixture on top and top that with the cheese. Bake at 300f for 30 minutes. ; name: peach mint salsa ; ingredients: peaches, red onion, green pepper, jalapeno pepper, honey, salt, lime, juice and zest of, of fresh mint ; preparation:Combine peaches, onion, peppers, honey, salt, line rind and juice in a medium saucepan. Bring to a boil over high heat, reduce heat and boil gently, uncovered for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. Stir in mint and cook for 1 minute. Ladle salsa into jars. Process 10 minutes for pint jars in boil water bath. ; name: lime yogurt dessert ; ingredients: boiling water, lime gelatin, ice cubes, yogurt ; preparation:Pour boiling water over jello in large bowl. Stir until dissolved. Add ice cubes. Stir until jello begins to thicken. Remove any unmelted ice. Add yogurt, beat with hand mixer until smooth. Pour into dessert dishes. Refrigerate until firm, about 45 minutes. Top with cool whip if desired. ; name: summer 3 bean barley salad ; ingredients: water, bouillon cubes, quick-cooking barley, garbanzo beans, black beans, green onions, honey mustard dressing ; preparation:In saucepan, combine water, bouillon and barley. Bring to boil. Reduce heat, cover and simmer for 10-12 minutes or until the liquid is gone and barley is tender. Place cooked barley in a bowl. Add beans and green onions. Toss with dressing. Serve or chill several hours before serving. ; name: greek shrimp scampi ; ingredients: olive oil, large shrimp, garlic cloves, red wine, tomatoes, feta cheese, parsley, kalamata olive, fresh ground pepper ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Heat oil in an ovenproof skillet pan over medium-high heat. Add shrimp and garlic and sauti until shrimp start to turn pink. Add remaining ingredients. Transfer skillet to oven and cook until shrimp are fully cooked, about 10 minutes. ; name: dillsas dill sauce ; ingredients: butter, flour, chicken stock, fresh dill, vinegar, sugar, egg yolk, salt ; preparation:

name: rice pudding smoothie ; ingredients: whole milk, cream cheese, pure vanilla extract, ground cinnamon, ice cube, cooked white rice, nutmeg, cinnamon stick ; preparation:Using a blender, mix the milk, cream cheese, vanilla and cinnamon and blend until smooth. Add the ice cubes and blend on high speed until slushy, about 15 seconds. Add the rice and pulse for 5 seconds. Sprinkle with nutmeg. Garnish with the cinnamon stick. ; name: atkins cauliflower potato salad ; ingredients: cauliflower, mayonnaise, lemon juice, sugar substitute, dried mustard, green onions, jalapeno peppers, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cook cauliflower in a large pot of boiling water 10 minsutes or until tender. Drain and rinse with cold water. In a large mixing bowl, mix mayonnaise, lemon juice, sugar substitute and mustard. Add cauliflower, green onions and pepper. Mix well until vegetables are evenly coated with dressing. Add salt and pepper to taste. Chill 30 mins. ; name: a simple harissa ; ingredients: tomatoes, onion, fresh parsley, hot paprika, extra virgin olive oil, fresh lemon juice, salt and pepper ; preparation:Cut the tomatoes in half and gently wring out the seeds and liquid over the sink. Grate each tomato half on the coarse side of a grater into a bowl by holding the cut side of the tomato half against the grater and grating the flesh just to the skin. Discard the skin. Grate the onion into the bowl. Stir in the parsley, paprika, oil, and lemon juice, salt and black pepper to taste. The mixture should be highly seasoned. Serve immediately, or no longer than 4 hours after making, at room temperature. ; name: mexi beef bites ; ingredients: ground beef, cheddar cheese, monterey jack cheese, green chilies, green taco sauce, eggs ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350. Cook ground beef until done. Drain off fat. Stir in cheeses, chilies, taco sauce and eggs. Spray an 8x8 baking dish with cooking spray. Transfer meat mixture to the prepared baking dish. Bake for about 40 minutes or until knife inserted comes out clean. Let cool for 15 minutes. Cut into squares. ; name: cherry cream parfaits ; ingredients: whipping cream, sugar, salt, vanilla, sour cream, cherry pie filling, nuts ; preparation:Whip cream to soft peaks. Slowly add sugar, salt and vanilla. Beat to stiff peaks. Fold in sour cream. Spoon half the pie filling in parfait glasses. Top with the cream mix. Repeat the layers. Sprinkle with nuts. ; name: revoltillos ; ingredients: cooked brown rice, ground turkey, onion, green bell pepper, pitted black olives, raisins ; preparation:Brown the meat in a large skillet or dutch oven. Add the onions and cook until transparent. Add the bell pepper, and saute until tender. Add the rice, olives, and raisins and heat through. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: bacon and cheese deviled eggs ; ingredients: hard-cooked eggs, mayonnaise, honey mustard, salt, black pepper, bacon, sharp cheddar cheese, parsley ; preparation:Halve eggs lengthwise. Spoon yolks into a bowl. Reserve whites. Mash yolks with fork. Add mayonnaise, honey-mustard, salt and pepper. Fold in bacon and cheese. Fill each half egg white with yolk mixture. Cover and refrigerate until ready to serve. ; name: cranberry special meatballs ; ingredients: ground beef, seasoned stuffing mix, eggs, onion, salt, black pepper, whole berry cranberry sauce, chili sauce, light brown sugar, ground ginger ; preparation:

name: succotash with mushrooms and romano ; ingredients: bacon, frozen lima beans, frozen white corn, garlic powder, fresh mushrooms, celery salt, butter, milk, paprika, romano cheese ; preparation:Heat a large skillet and saute bacon pieces until browned. Add lima beans and cook, stirring, 5 minutes. Add corn and cook, stirring, 5 minutes. Add garlic powder, mushrooms, celery salt, and butter. Cook, stirring, until butter is melted and mushrooms are browned, about 5 minutes. Add mik, paprika and romano cheese. Cook, stirring, until mixture is thickened and heated through. ; name: eric s easy grilled chicken ; ingredients: italian dressing, teriyaki sauce, garlic, boneless skinless chicken breast halves ; preparation:In a bowl, add the italian dressing, teriyaki sauce and minced garlic. Stir to combine. Add the chicken breast halves. Cover and marinate in the refrigerator overnight. Grill over hot coals for approximately 10 minutes on each side or until juices run clear. ; name: pork tenderloin parmigiana ; ingredients: pork tenderloin, egg, season salt, pepper, breadcrumbs, oil, spaghetti sauce, mozzarella cheese, parmesan cheese ; preparation:Beat egg, add salt & pepper. Dip tenderloin into egg mixture, then in bread crumbs. Brown in hot oil on all sides. Pour off grease. Add spaghetti sauce. Cover & cook in 350 degree oven for 30-35 minutes. Remove cover, top with cheeses. Cook an additional 10 minutes, uncovered. Serve with cous-cous topped with spaghetti sauce. ; name: bacon and pepper pasta ; ingredients: bacon, onions, garlic cloves, green pepper, sweet red pepper, stewed tomatoes, linguine, jalapeno pepper ; preparation:In a large skillet, cook bacon until crisp. Remove bacon with slotted spoon and set aside, reserving the drippings. Saute onions and garlic in drippings for 3 minutes. Add peppers, cook and stir for 3 minutes. Stir in tomatoes and heat through. Add bacon and mix well. Serve over pasta. Cooking time does not reflect time to cook pasta. ; name: simple scallops ; ingredients: garlic, butter, dry sherry, mushroom, scallions, parsley, scallops, flour, half-and-half ; preparation:Combine garlic, butter, sherry, mushrooms, scallions and parsley in a saucepan. Saute 2 minutes over medium heat. Add scallops, stir and simmer 2 minutes. Add flour, stir to incorporate. Slowly add the half and half stirring until thickened and scallops are tender. Serve in a bowl or over rice. ; name: a very special gnocchi ; ingredients: gnocchi, bacon, leeks, unsalted butter, all-purpose flour, skim milk, parmesan cheese, cheddar cheese, cooked boneless skinless chicken breasts, baby spinach leaves ; preparation:Cook gnocchi according to package directions. Set aside. Saut bacon until crisp. Set aside. Saut leeks in bacon fat. In medium saucepan, melt butter. Over medium heat, whisk in flour. Whisk in milk, stirring constantly until boiling. Add cheeses & stir until melted. In large bowl, combine all components & stir well, adding spinach last. ; name: crispy chicken the best and easiest ; ingredients: plain flour, salt, pepper, smoked paprika, garlic salt, chicken pieces ; preparation:Place flour, salt, pepper, paprika and garlic salt onto a plate and stir. Change the seasonings to your taste. Open out the chicken pieces and coat both sides with the flour mixture. Place coated chicken pieces onto a wire rack over a baking tray. Place into a medium oven. Bake for 15 minutes. Turn the pieces over. Bake for another 15 to 20 minutes until cooked and very crispy skinned. Yes, that is it. Now enjoy. ; name: blt on croissant ; ingredients: shortcut bacon, croissants, tomatoes, butter lettuce leaves, mayonnaise, garlic clove, flat leaf parsley ; preparation:

name: date walnut scones ; ingredients: self raising flour, table salt, caster sugar, dates, walnuts, lemon, milk, cream, eggs, plain flour ; preparation:Prehaeat fan forced oven to 180c. Sift the flour, salt and sugar into a bowl. Add the dates, walnuts and lemon zest & mix lightly. Make a well in the centre of the mixture and set bowl aside. Whisk the milk, cream and the eggs in a seperate small bowl and pour the milk mixture into the flour mixture. Using your finger. Press dough lightly using finger. Gently roll out the dough until 2-3cm thick then using a 5-6cm scone cutter cut the dough into rounds. Place rounds on a non stick baking tray and brush each round with a little milk. Bake scones for 20 minutes or until golden. Serve warm with favourite topping. ; name: hass avocado tortilla soup ; ingredients: fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, low-sodium tomato soup, cilantro, garlic cloves, ground black pepper, hass avocado, corn tortilla chips ; preparation:In a large pan, combine chicken broth, soup, cilantro, garlic and pepper. Bring to a boil, decrease heat, and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool slightly, and puree in batches in a blender. Return to pan, add avocado cubes and heat through. Ladle into soup bowls and garnish with reserved avocado cubes and crumbled tortilla chips. Serve. ; name: baked stuffed lobster for two ; ingredients: lobsters, soft breadcrumbs, butter, salt, pepper, tarragon, vegetable oil ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450f degrees. When lobster is cool enough to handle, split in half lengthwise. Remove dark strip if present. Remove the coral and liver to a medium bowl. To coral, add bread crumbs and butter, salt, pepper and taragon. Put mixture in cavaties of lobster, drizzle with vegetable oil. Bake for 25 minutes or until browned. ; name: bavarian strawberry cream pie ; ingredients: strawberry, sugar, cold water, unflavored gelatin, boiling water, fresh lemon juice, heavy cream ; preparation:In a large bowl, crush strawberries and add sugar. Let stand 30 minutes. Pour cold water in a bowl and add the unflavored gelatin to the top. Let stand 5 minutes. Add boiling water to dissolve the gelatin. Stir. Stir in the the strawberries and add fresh lemon juice. Chill the gelatin until it is the thickness of unbeaten egg whites. Whip the cream until firm peaks form. Gently fold into strawberry mixture. Pour into pie crust and refrigerate for at least 4 hours. ; name: boozy pumpkin pie ; ingredients: pie shells, canned pumpkin, eggs, white sugar, ground cinnamon, cornstarch, butter, half-and-half, canadian rye whisky ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375f. Place pumpkin in large bowl and add the white sugar, egg yolks and cinnamon. Beat well with mixer until thoroughly combined. Add the cream, melted butter and whisky and combine well. In another large bowl and with clean beaters, beat egg whites until stiff. Sprinkle cornstarch over beaten egg whites and fold this mixture into pumpkin mixture. Pour into pie plate lined with pie crust-- i use a 10-inch pyrex deep-dish glass pie plate and it fills it-- and carefully place in oven. Bake for 1 hour. Centre should be set at this time. ; name: spaghetti alla carbonara mario batali ; ingredients: extra virgin olive oil, pancetta, spaghetti, parmigiano-reggiano cheese, eggs, fresh ground black pepper ; preparation:Bring 6 quarts of water to boil in a large pot, and add 2 tablespoons salts. Meanwhile, combine the olive oil and pancetta in a 12- to 14-inch saut pan set over medium heat, and cook until the pancetta has rendered its fat and is crispy and golden. Remove from the heat and set aside. Cook the spaghetti in the boiling water until just al dente. Scoop out cup of the pasta cooking water and set aside. Drain the pasta. Add the reserved pasta water to the pan with the pancetta, then toss in the pasta and heat, shaking the pan, for 1 minute. Remove from the heat, add 1 cup of the parmigiano, the egg whites, and pepper to taste, and toss until thoroughly mixed. Divide the pasta among four warmed serving bowls. Make a nest in the center of each one, and gently drop an egg yolk into each nest. Season the egg yolks with more pepper and sprinkle the remaining cup parmigiano over the top. Serve immediately. ; name: carne adovada marinated pork ; ingredients: pork ribs, salt, garlic, whole leaf oregano, blended red chili sauce ; preparation:Sprinkle meat with salt. Add garlic and oregano to blended chili. Pour over meat and marinate in refrigerator 6-8 hours or overnight. Cook slowly on top of stove or in 350 oven until meat is done, about 1 hour. Thick slices of potatoes may be marinated with the meat. ; name: seafood layer dip ; ingredients: cream cheese, ranch salad dressing, seafood cocktail sauce, cheddar cheese, imitation crabmeat, shrimp, green pepper, tomatoes, green onions ; preparation:

name: cauliflower gratine gratin ; ingredients: cauliflower, condensed milk, milk, swiss cheese, buttered bread crumb, bacon ; preparation:Cook cauliflower in boiling salted water about 12 minutes, just until fork tender. Drain and place in shallow baking dish, combine soup, milk. Stir in cheese. Pour over cauliflower. Sprinkle with crumbs. Bake at 350 for 20 minutes, until hot and bubbly. Ganish with bacon. ; name: winter solstice soup ; ingredients: butter, onions, carrots, potatoes, milk, water, salt, dried parsley, thyme, bay leaf ; preparation:Saut onions in the butter in a large soup pot. Add carrots, potatoes, water, salt, parsley, thyme and bay leaf. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 30 minutes. Discard the bay leaf. Puree soup in a blender in small batches or with a stick blender. Return to the pot. Stir in milk. Season with salt and pepper to taste. ; name: super easy chocolate truffles ; ingredients: semisweet chocolate, cream cheese, powdered sugar, vanilla extract, extract, cocoa, nuts ; preparation:Melt chocolate in the microwave on high for 60 seconds. Stir and continue to cook on high for another 30 seconds or until chocolate is completely melted. Beat cream cheese until smooth. Add powdered sugar and continue beating until well blended. Stir in chocolate, vanilla and extract flavouring. Refrigerate for 2 hours or until firm. Shape into 1 inch balls. Roll into cocoa, powdered sugar, nuts or dip into melted chocolate. Store in refrigerator. Alternative. Use white chocolate in place of semi-sweet chips and follow same directions. ; name: cheap easy clam sauce for pasta ; ingredients: olive oil, basil, garlic cloves, onion, crushed red pepper flakes, clams, margarine, milk ; preparation:Heat olive oil in small pan, and add garlic and the optional onions. Cook on medium about 3 minutes or until tender and lightly browned. Stir in the basil or parsley and optional red pepper flakes. Add the drained juice from the can of clams. Bring to a boil, and then reduce heat to low allowing to simmer about 5 minutes. Stir in the clams and the butter. Once butter is melted, add the optional milk or half and half and cook until heated through. Serve over spaghetti or linguine or other favorite pasta. ; name: stuffed chicken ; ingredients: seasoned stuffing mix, boneless skinless chicken breasts, cream of chicken soup, sour cream, water ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375 degrees. In a small bowl pour stuffing mix and water. Open chicken breasts, and if they are too thick to fold in half flatten and stretch them by placing on cutting board and using heavy rolling pin roll out chicken until it is able to be folded in half. Give the stuffing a quick mix with a spoon. Spoon stuffing onto one half of the chicken and fold chicken breast over to cover. Place breasts in baking pan. Continue stuffing breasts until all breasts are used. If you have left over stuffing go back and open breasts and continue stuffing until all stuffing is used. Combine soup and sour cream. Spread over chicken breasts. Cover and bake for 45 minutes to an hour until chicken is thoroughly cooked. ; name: corned beef and cabbage bake ; ingredients: butter, cabbage, onion, caraway seed, deli corned beef, swiss cheese, thousand island dressing, refrigerated buttermilk biscuits ; preparation:In a large skillet, melt the butter. Stir in the cabbage, onion, and caraway seeds. Cover and cook over medium heat for 8-10 minutes or until the cabbage is crisp tender, stirring occasionally. Set aside. Meanwhile, in a large bowl, combine the corned beef, swiss cheese, and salad dressing. Seperate the biscuits. Place 10 biscuits in each of two ungreased 9-inch round baking pans. Press the biscuits onto the bottom and halfway up the sides of the pans. Add cabbage mixture. Top with the corned beef mixture. Bake, uncovered, at 350 f for 20-25 minutes or until heated through and biscuits are golden brown. Cut into wedges. ; name: peanut butter marshmallow fluff coconut cookies ; ingredients: butter, sugar, brown sugar, eggs, vanilla, creamy peanut butter, all-purpose flour, baking soda, marshmallow cream, coconut flakes ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350f. In a large bowl, cream together the butter, peanut butter, white sugar and brown sugar until smooth and fluffy. Beat in the eggs one at time, then stir in the vanilla. Combine the flour and baking soda. Stir in to the peanut butter mixture. Then fold in the marshmallow fluff in just until combined. When you drop the cookies by the rounded spoonfuls or use a cookie scooper into the ungreased cookie sheet first put a pinch of coconut flakes on bottom on cookie sheet then place dough on top of coconut then after all your cookies have been drop place a nice hefty pinch of coconut flakes on top of cookie dough then press with fork as you would with regular peanut butter cookies to impress a criss cross with fork. Bake for 15 minutes. ; name: cucumber red onion and radish salad ; ingredients: cucumber, red onion, red radishes, vegetable oil, white wine vinegar, sugar, dry crushed red pepper ; preparation:

name: basil herbal butter ; ingredients: sweet unsalted butter, fresh basil, fresh parsley, shallot, fresh ground black pepper, paprika, hot sauce, lemon juice ; preparation:Let butter soften to room temperature. Beat in other ingredients. Pack butter into molds or crocks or form balls with a melon baller. Chill for at least 3 hours before serving. Can be stored for upto 1 month in the refrigerator or 3 months in the freezer. ; name: brownie bottom cheesecake ; ingredients: brownie mix, philadelphia cream cheese, sugar, vanilla, sour cream, eggs ; preparation:Prepare and bake brownie mix as directed on package for 8 inch square pan in well greased 9 inch springform pan. Mix cream cheese, sugar and vanilla with electric mixer on medium speed until well blended. Blend in sour cream. Add eggs, mixing on low speed just until blended. Bake at 325 for 60 to 65 minutes or until center is almost set if using a silver springform pan. Run knife or metal spatula around rim of pan to loosen cake. Cool before removing rim of pan. Refrigerate 4 hours or overnight. ; name: thai chicken thighs crock pot ; ingredients: chicken thighs, chicken stock, smooth peanut butter, soy sauce, fresh cilantro, lime juice, hot chili pepper, fresh ginger, peanuts ; preparation:Place chicken thighs in slow cooker. Combine stock, peanut butter, soy sauce, cilantro, lime juice, chile pepper and ginger. Mix well and pour sauce over chicken. Cover and cook on low for 6 to 8 hours, until juices run clear when chicken is pierced with a fork. Serve garnished with chopped peanuts and additional fresh cilantro. ; name: lamb stuffed bell peppers ii ; ingredients: bell peppers, lean ground lamb, onion, pine nuts, raisins, ground allspice, cinnamon, salt & pepper, lemon juice ; preparation:Fry the lamb and onion in a non stick skillet until the lamb is lightly colored. Add nuts, raisins, spices, mix well and saute 1 minute, season with salt & pepper. Stuff the peppers, set into a lightly greased baking dish. Cover with foil. Bake in 375f oven for 30 minutes. Sprinkle on the lemon juice, not too much. Serve hot or at room temperature. ; name: zinger dill dressing ; ingredients: tea bags, white vinegar, olive oil, dill ; preparation:Combine tea bags and vinegar in a jar with a tight-fitting lid. Let steep for 10 minutes, then remove tea bags, gently squeezing the remaining drops into the vinegar before discarding. Add olive oil and dill. Shake well and serve. I also like to use red zinger and raspberry zinger tea for this dressing. ; name: blushing cranberry cider ; ingredients: blood orange, unsweetened pineapple juice, cranberry juice, cinnamon sticks, fresh ginger, whole allspice, cloves, dark brown sugar, orange slices ; preparation:Remove two, 3-inch-long strips of peel from the orange and set aside until needed. Next juice and strain the orange. To a medium pot, add the orange, pineapple and cranberry juices, orange peel, cinnamon sticks, ginger, allspice and cloves. Make sure to sample and add the sugar if desired. Heat over medium-high heat until it starts to simmer, then reduce the heat to low and continue to simmer 30 - 45 minutes. Strain the cider, pour into warm mugs, add orange slices and serve immediately. ; name: simply guacamole ; ingredients: hass avocado, mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, garlic salt ; preparation:Slice avocado lengthwise. Remove pit and scoop avocado into a small bowl. Add mayonnaise, lime juice, worcestershire sauce, hot pepper sauce, and salt. Stir and mash the ingredients together until guacamole is preferred consistency. Serve immediately, or cover and refrigerate if desired. ; name: green bean and carrot soup vegan gluten free ; ingredients: olive oil, onion, carrots, green beans, vegetable stock, almond milk, salt, dried herbs, fresh parsley ; preparation:

name: hass avocado tortilla soup ; ingredients: fat-free low-sodium chicken broth, low-sodium tomato soup, cilantro, garlic cloves, ground black pepper, hass avocado, corn tortilla chips ; preparation:In a large pan, combine chicken broth, soup, cilantro, garlic and pepper. Bring to a boil, decrease heat, and simmer for 10 minutes. Cool slightly, and puree in batches in a blender. Return to pan, add avocado cubes and heat through. Ladle into soup bowls and garnish with reserved avocado cubes and crumbled tortilla chips. Serve. ; name: fruity sangria ; ingredients: dry red wine, apple juice, grapefruit, orange, lemon, pear, apple ; preparation:Pour the wine, apple juice, and grapefruit pieces in a large pitcher. Mix well, cover and refrigerate overnight. The next day, add the orange and lemon slices to the wine. Refrigerate for 3 more hours. Add the pear and apple to the mixture, then allow to stand for a further 1 hour to absorb the flavor fully. Mix well and serve over ice. ; name: key west chicken ; ingredients: soy sauce, honey, vegetable oil, lime juice, garlic, chicken breast halves ; preparation:In a shallow container, blend soy sauce, honey, vegetable oil, lime juice, and garlic. Place chicken breast halves into the mixture, and turn to coat. Cover, and marinate in the refrigerator at least 30 minutes. Preheat an outdoor grill for high heat. Lightly oil the grill grate. Discard marinade, and grill chicken 6 to 8 minutes on each side, until juices run clear. ; name: herbed steak and mushrooms ; ingredients: beef round steak, onion, garlic cloves, fresh mushrooms, cream of mushroom soup, dry white wine, dried basil, dried marjoram, pepper, cooked noodles ; preparation:Trim as much fat as possible from meat. Cut round steak into serving pieces. Add onion slices, garlic, and mushrooms into a 4-quart slow-cooker. Put beef on top of vegetables. In a small mixing bowl, add the soup, wine, basil, marjoram, and pepper. Stir to combine. Pour over meat. Cover slow-cooker and cook on low for 6-8 hours. Serve meat and sauce over noodles. ; name: mixed greens with honey lime dressing ; ingredients: olive oil, fresh lime juice, honey, lime zest, salt and pepper, red onion, mixed greens, plum tomatoes ; preparation:Whisk first 4 ingredients in a small bowl to blend, season dressing with salt and pepper. Transfer 2 tablespoons dressing to another smaller bowl. Mix in onions. Let onion and remaiming dressing stand at least 1 hour and up to 3 hours. Toss onion mixture occasionally. Mix lettuces, tomatoes, and onion mixture in bowl. Toss with dressing, serve. ; name: tasty bbq ribs ; ingredients: beef, barbecue sauce, spaghetti sauce, brown sugar ; preparation:Line a deep roasting pan with foil. Place ribs in the bottom of pan. Pour bbq sauce and spaghetti sauce over top. Sprinkle brown sugar on top of sauces. Do not mix, just leave it layered. Bake uncovered at 250 degrees fahrenheit for 6 hours, or at 225 degrees fahrenheit for 8 to 10 hours. ; name: glazed zucchini ; ingredients: zucchini, yellow squash, water, balsamic vinegar, dried oregano, unsalted butter, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place all squash into a medium sized pot with water and vinegar, over medium high heat. Bring just to a boil. Cover, and reduce heat to medium. Cook 10 minutes. Uncover. Add oregano and raise heat to medium high. Allow water to boil away, and the vinegar to reduce to a glaze for the squash, app. 5-7 minutes. When glazed to a rich brown color, add the butter. Turn squash to coat with butter. Season with salt and pepper. Serve. ; name: apple corned beef brisket for the slow cooker ; ingredients: red potatoes, onion, apple, corned beef brisket, cabbage, apple cider, brown sugar, dijon mustard, ground cloves, black pepper ; preparation:

name: sauerkraut nourishing traditions ; ingredients: cabbage, caraway seed, sea salt, whey, carrot ; preparation:In a bowl, mix cabbage with caraway seeds, sea salt and whey. Pound with a wooden pounder or a meat hammer for about 10 minutes to release juices. You can also use your hands to squeeze the juices out of the cabbage. Transfer the cabbage and all of the juice in a quart-sized, wide-mouth mason jar and press down firmly with pounder until juices come to the top of the cabbage. The top of the cabbage should be at least 1 inch below the top of the jar. Cover tightly and keep at room temperature for about 3 days before transferring to cold storage. The sauerkraut may be eaten immediately, but it improves with age. ; name: southern scalloped tomatoes ; ingredients: tomatoes, butter, bread cubes, onion, sugar, tabasco sauce, sweet basil, cheddar cheese, bacon, saltine crackers ; preparation:Melt butter. Add bread cubes and brown lightly. Add more butter if needed and lightly brown onions. Fry bacon, drain, bacon and crumbled bacon into drippings. Mix all ingredients and spoon into 2 quart casserole dish. Cover with crushed crackers. Bake at 350 degrees for 30-45 minutes. Add cheese on top last 15 minutes. ; name: pesto artichoke stuffing w tomatoes and pine nuts ; ingredients: chicken flavor stuffing mix, pasta-style chunky tomatoes, butter, basil pesto, water, artichoke hearts, pine nuts ; preparation:In 2 quart saucepan, bring to a boil the undrained tomatoes, butter, pesto, artichoke hearts and water. Stir in stuffing mix and pine nuts. Cover, turn off heat, and let stand 5 minutes. Fluff with a fork. For moister stuffing, add 1-2 tbl. More water. ; name: mexican s mores ; ingredients: flour tortillas, mini marshmallows, mini chocolate chip, peanut butter, aluminum foil ; preparation:Spread peanut butter on a tortilla. Scatter a few chips and marshmallows on the peanut butter. Fold sides in on tortilla. Roll up tortilla. Wrap tightly in foil. Bake at 350 for 10 minutes or grill til melted. ; name: plum chutney ; ingredients: italian plums, cranberries, jalapeno peppers, fresh ginger, water, sugar, vinegar, cumin, whole cardamom pod, kaffir lime leaves ; preparation:Wash, pit and chop the plums. Wearing gloves, stem, seed and chop the peppers. Put the plums, cranberries and peppers in a large kettle. Add the ginger, peeled and grated. Add the water, sugar, vinegar and spices. Put the jars into a large canning kettle, and cover with water to an inch above the tops of the jars. Bring to a boil and boil for 10 minutes to sterilize. Simmer the fruit mixture until thickened, about 20 minutes. Remove the keffir lime leaves and cardamom. Pack into hot sterilized jars and seal with lids sterilized according to the manufacturers instructions. Boiling water process 15 minutes. ; name: aunt marie s peas ; ingredients: mushrooms, peas, onion, celery, butter, pimientos, salt, pepper ; preparation:Drain mushrooms, reserve liquid. Cook peas in amount of mushroom liquid called for on pea package. Cook onions& celery in butter until soft. Add pimentos& mushrooms, heat thoroughly. Add peas, salt& pepper. Refrigerate until next day. Heat to serve. ; name: lick your fingers kugel ; ingredients: salted butter, dark brown sugar, pecans, wide egg noodles, eggs, cinnamon, sugar, salt ; preparation:Melt half the butter in a 12-cup mold or tube pan. Swirl it around the bottom and up the sides. Press the brown sugar into the bottom and press the pecans into the sugar. Boil the noodles according to the package directions and then drain. Mix with the eggs, the remaining butter, melted, cinnamon, sugar, and salt and pour into the mold. Bake in a preheated 350-degree oven for 1 hour and 15 minutes or until the top is brown. Let sit for 15 minutes before unmolding. The top will become slightly hard like a praline. Serve cold or at room temperature. ; name: kremidotiganites greek onion fritters ; ingredients: onion, flour, of fresh mint, oil, salt and black pepper, water ; preparation:

name: strawberry watermelon vinaigrette ; ingredients: strawberry, lemon, watermelon, salt, white wine vinegar, sugar, oil, mixed greens ; preparation:Combine all ingredients except oil in a blender or food processor. Puree until smooth. With machine running, add oil in a. Thin stream. Process until well blended. Transfer to a small bowl. Cover and refrigerate for up to 2 days. Chill before serving. Serve on leaf lettuce or mixed baby greens. Does not include chilling time. ; name: mustard potato salad ; ingredients: potatoes, green onions, dill pickles, mayonnaise, mustard, salt and pepper ; preparation:Boil potatoes for 20 minutes. In the meantime mix the rest of the ingredients together in a bowl. Peel potatoes and chop into bite size pieces. Add chopped potatoes to mixture in bowl and carefully combine until everything is mixed up. Either chill in fridge or serve at once. ; name: turkey avocado basil rosemary sandwich ; ingredients: whole wheat bread, avocado, garlic powder, lean turkey breast, radish sprouts, fresh rosemary, fresh basil leaf, light mayonnaise ; preparation:In a small bowl, mash avocado, garlic powder and rosemary together with a fork, leaving the mixture slightly chunky but thoroughly mixed. Spread avocado mixture on one slice of bread, and mayo on the other. Sprinkle basil leaves over the mayo. Add turkey and sprouts. Repeat for the second sandwich. Serve. ; name: yogurt mint marinated chicken ; ingredients: skinless chicken breast halves, coarse salt, fresh lemon juice, plain low-fat yogurt, of fresh mint, fresh ginger, garlic cloves, garam masala, chili powder ; preparation:Rinse chicken under cold water. Place in a large bowl and rub with salt and lemon juice. Set aside. Blend remaining ingredients. Toss well to mix and then coat chicken. Seal bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 24 hours. Preheat oven to 400 f. Place chicken on a foil-lined baking sheet and bake for 35 minutes. ; name: bacon topped meatloaf ; ingredients: chili sauce, eggs, worcestershire sauce, onion, cheddar cheese, dry breadcrumbs, salt, pepper, lean ground beef, bacon ; preparation:In a bowl, combine the first eight ingredients. Crumble beef over mixture and mix well. Shape into a loaf in an ungreased 13 inch by 9 inch by 2 inch baking dish. Top with bacon. Bake uncovered at 350 for 70-80 minutes or until meat is no longer pink and a meat thermometer reads 160 degrees. Drain, let stand for 10 minutes before cutting. ; name: date cake ; ingredients: flour, sugar, egg, baking powder, butter, pitted dates, boiling water, baking soda, salt, milk ; preparation:Put dates in boiling water with baking soda and leave to cool. Cream sugar, butter and vanilla extract. Add egg and dates and mix in well. Add all dry ingredients. Place in prepared baking pan and ake at 180c for 45 minutes. 5 minutes before cake comes out of oven, boil topping ingredients together for 3 minutes. Stab cake with knife and pour topping over as it comes out of the oven. Serve warm or cool. ; name: mohave mesquite bread ; ingredients: mesquite meal, whole wheat flour, baking powder, baking soda, oil, water ; preparation:Combine dry ingredients. Add oil and water and mix until dough forms a ball and cleans the sides of the bowl. Lightly grease a cookie sheet or flat pan. Form the dough into a half-sphere loaf on the pan. Bake for 30 minutes at 350 degrees. ; name: kraft bacon tomato cheese crescents ; ingredients: crescent rolls, cream cheese, tomatoes, bell pepper, bacon ; preparation:

name: parmesan pull apart mini bundts ; ingredients: buttermilk biscuits, butter, italian seasoning, garlic cloves, parmesan cheese, cheese ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Spray mini bundt pan with cooking spray. Combine butter, garlic, italian seasoning and cheeses in bowl. Cut each biscuit into quarters and dip in butter. Fill each bundt half full with biscuit pieces and bake 10-15 minutes in preheated oven, until just starting to brown. ; name: zippy egg salad ; ingredients: hard-boiled eggs, mayonnaise, dijon mustard, prepared horseradish, salt, fresh ground black pepper, cayenne pepper ; preparation:With an egg slicer, slice eggs into rounds and place in a bowl. Fold in remaining ingredients until well combined. If needed, add more mayo until desired consistancy. Adjust flavors as desired. Great on whole wheat or egg bread with lettuce. ; name: linguine with broccoli peas ricotta and bacon ; ingredients: bacon, linguine, broccoli, peas, butter, ricotta cheese, basil ; preparation:Fry the bacon over a medium heat until crispy and drain on a plate lined with paper towels. Bring to boil one medium saucepan and one large saucepan of salted water. Put the linguine into the large saucepan and swirl the water to ensure it does not stick together. When the pasta is almost cooked plunge the broccoli and peas into the other saucepan of boiling water. Drain the pasta and return to the large pan with the butter. Drain the broccoli and peas well and add to the pasta with the ricotta, bacon and basil. Toss gently, transfer to four warm bowls and serve immediately. ; name: easy dijon roasted potatoes ; ingredients: potatoes, olive oil, dijon mustard, dried oregano, salt and pepper ; preparation:Place potatoes in a large baking dish or roasting pan. Combine remaining ingredients. Drizzle over potatoes. Toss to coat. Bake at 424f for 30-40 minutes, stirring often, until potatoes are tender. ; name: caramel butter pecan bars ; ingredients: all-purpose flour, brown sugar, butter, pecans, caramel ice cream topping, milk chocolate chips ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 f. Combine flour and brown sugar in a bowl. Cut in butter until crumbly. Press into bottom of an ungreased 13x9x2 inch baking pan. Top with pecans. Drizzle warmed caramel topping evenly over pecans. Bake at 350 f for 15-20 minutes or until caramel is bubbly. Place on wire rack. Sprinkle with chocolate chips. Let stand 5 minutes, then spread chocolate chips over caramel-pecan layer. Cool for at least 6 hours at room temp or until chocolate has set. Cut into bars. ; name: easy stuffed meatballs ; ingredients: ground beef, evaporated milk, stove top stuffing mix, cream of mushroom soup, ketchup, worcestershire sauce ; preparation:Mix stove-top mix as directed. Mix ground beef with evaporated milk. Form into thin patties about 3 to 4 inches in diameter. Place a spoonful of prepared stuffing in center of each patty, then form into meatball. Place meatballs in oven-proof glass pan. Combine mushroom soup, ketchup and worcestershire sauce and pour over meatballs. Bake uncovered 350 degrees f. 1 hour. ; name: macaroni and bacon casserole ; ingredients: macaroni noodles, shredded cheddar cheese, vegetable cocktail, bacon, salt, pepper, milk ; preparation:Cook noodles as directed on package, drain. Add shredded cheese to cooked noodles while still hot and mix together. Add v8. Add enough milk so there is juice on the bottom of casserole dish, enough that it doesnt dry out, so the milk may not be necessary. Add salt and pepper to taste. Cover casserole with uncooked bacon slices. Bake uncovered at 350 degrees fahrenheit for 45 minutes to an hour. Bacon needs to be cooked on top. ; name: cranberry ginger pudding ; ingredients: butter, caster sugar, eggs, self raising flour, gingerroot, orange, juice and zest of, ground ginger, fresh cranberries, dried cranberries ; preparation:

name: scallop and snow pea stir fry ; ingredients: vegetable oil, garlic, fresh ginger, large scallop, snow peas, reduced-sodium chicken broth, reduced sodium soy sauce, green onions, eggs ; preparation:In a large wok or nonstick frying pan, heat oil over medium-high heat. Add garlic and ginger and cook, stirring, until fragrant, about 30 seconds. Add scallops and stir to coat with garlic mixture, then cook 1 minute. Mix in snow peas and cook 1 minute. Stir in broth and soy sauce and cook just until simmering. Sprinkle with green onions and mix with noodles. ; name: warm lentil ham salad with dijon cream ; ingredients: dried lentils, reduced-fat sour cream, dijon mustard, nonfat milk, white wine vinegar, fresh thyme, black pepper, cooked ham, celery, red onion ; preparation:Place lentils in a large saucepan and add water to 2 inches above the lentils. Bring to a boil, cover, reduce heat, and simmer 20 minutes, or until tender. Drain well. Combine sour cream and next 5 ingredients in a large bowl. Add lentils, ham, celery, and onion, and toss well. ; name: crab tortellini salad ; ingredients: frozen cheese tortellini, mayonnaise, heavy cream, imitation crabmeat, fresh lemon juice, salt, black pepper ; preparation:Cook the tortellini according to the package directions. Drain, rinse, and drain again. In a large bowl, combine the tortellini and the remaining ingredients. Mix well. Cover, and chill for at least 2 hours before serving. ; name: spinach salad with egg vinaigrette ; ingredients: egg, fresh spinach, garlic clove, vegetable oil, cider vinegar, salt, pepper ; preparation:Heat egg and water to cover in small saucepan to boiling. Remove from heat. Let stand covered 10 minutes. Meanwhile, trim large stems from spinach. Rinse thoroughly and drain. Run cool water over egg, then peel. Rub salad bowl with garlic. Mash egg in bowl with fork. Add oil, vinegar, salt, and pepper. Beat with fork to blend. Add spinach to vinaigrette and toss to coat. ; name: shrimp with orzo olives and feta ; ingredients: orzo pasta, shrimp, diced tomatoes, feta cheese, balsamic vinegar, lemon juice, scallion, dried oregano ; preparation:Cook orzo according to directions, drain well. In a large serving bowl, combine shrimp, tomatoes, cheese, vinegar, lemon juice, scallions, oregano, salt and pepper. Toss well. Add orzo and stir to mix. Garnish with kalamata olives, if desired. ; name: lea s peach pie cobbler ; ingredients: peaches, sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, dry tapioca, butter, cinnamon sugar ; preparation:Drain peaches, reserving 1 cup of syrup for recipe. Combine peaches, syrup, cinnamon, nutmeg & tapioca in large sauce pan. Bring mixture to a boil, and boil for one minute. Remove from heat and cool. Prepare 9x13 pan lined with pie crust. Prepare lattice topping for cobbler. Place peach mixture in crust lined pan. Dot mixture with butter portions, spaced evenly. Arrange lattice topping, crimping into top edge of crust. Sprinkle crust with cinnamon-sugar mixture for color. Place, uncovered, in 450f oven for 10 minutes. Reduce heat to 400f and bake 60 minutes, or until golden brown. ; name: pizza with honey caramelized onions cheese and mushrooms ; ingredients: olive oil, onions, honey, balsamic vinegar, fresh mushrooms, boboli pizza crusts, feta cheese, dried thyme ; preparation:Preheat oven to 450 degrees. Heat olive oil over medium heat, add onions and saute until tender, about 10 minutes. Add honey and vinegar, reduce heat and saute until onions are golden brown, about another 8 minutes. Season with salt and pepper. Place pizza crust on pizza stone or baking sheet, sprinkle with cheese and thyme. Top this with onion mixture, then mushrooms. Cook for about 15 minutes or until cheese is melted. ; name: baked chicken fajitas ; ingredients: boneless skinless chicken breast, diced tomatoes with green chilies, onion, green pepper, red pepper, canola oil, chili powder, ground cumin, salt, flour tortillas ; preparation:

name: mom s old fashioned cream pie ; ingredients: sugar, flour, whipping cream, half-and-half, egg whites, unbaked 9-inch pie crust ; preparation:In a two-quart bowl, mix the first 4 ingredients together. Fold the beaten egg whites in until all are well mixed. Pour into unbaked pie shell of 9inch pan. Sprinkle nutmeg on top and bake at 325 degrees for 1 hour. When taken from oven, filling will seem a little shaky, but when cooled, will be creamy. Prep time does not include making pie crust. ; name: chocolate peanut butter gooey cake ; ingredients: chocolate cake mix, egg, butter, cream cheese, creamy peanut butter, eggs, powdered sugar, vanilla ; preparation:Preheat oven to 350 degrees. Grease a 9x13 inch pan. For crust, mix cake mix, egg, and 1 stick of melted butter with a large spoon and pat into the bottom and up the sides of pan. For filling mix cream cheese, peanut butter, and eggs together with mixer until smooth, scraping down the sides. Add powdered sugar and vanilla. Mix until smooth. Slowly add melted butter to filling and mix until smooth. Pour the filling over the crust and bake 25 - 30 minutes. Check after 25 minutes. When it is done, the edges will pull away from the sides of pan and the filling will have browned, but middle should be very gooey. It will still jiggle. ; name: fruit crisp ; ingredients: apples, granulated sugar, rolled oats, brown sugar, all-purpose flour, ground nutmeg, butter, coconut, vanilla ice cream ; preparation:Preheat oven to 375. If fruit is frozen, thaw but do not drain. Place fruit in a 2-quart square baking dish. Stir in the granulated sugar. For topping, in a medium bowl combine the oats, brown sugar, flour, and nutmeg. Cut in butter until mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Stir in the nuts. Sprinkle topping over filling. Bake for 30 to 35 minutes or until fruit is tender and topping is golden. Cool slightly. Serve warm with ice cream if desired. ; name: lemon sherbet ; ingredients: whipping cream, plain yogurt, sugar, lemon, juice of, yellow food coloring, lemon peel ; preparation:In a bowl, combine whipping cream and sugar. Whip with mixer on high speed until cream is stiff. Fold in lemon juice, yogurt, and lemon peel. Add coloring at this time, if desired. Put in freezer. Stir every 45 minutes until frozen. ; name: easiest and cheesiest stove top macaroni and cheese ; ingredients: water, butter, salt, elbow macaroni, evaporated milk, velveeta cheese ; preparation:Bring water, butter and salt to rolling boil. Add macaroni. Cook over medium heat for 8 to 10 minutes or until water is cooked down a bit and pasta is ready. Take off heat. Do not drain. Add evaporated milk and velveeta cheese. Stir, then cover pot and allow to sit for a few minutes until cheese is melted. Uncover and stir again. If too dry, add more evaporated milk. Serve. ; name: outback steakhouse outback special ; ingredients: sirloin steaks, old bay seasoning, light brown sugar, garlic powder, onion powder, ground cumin ; preparation:Heat an outdoor grill, stovetop grill pan, or broiler. Mix spice rub ingredients. Rub on both sides of steak. Grill or broil 5 minutes on each side for medium-rare. Remove to plates. Let rest 5 minutes before serving. ; name: chicken wild rice soup mmmmmmmmm ; ingredients: cream of chicken soup, cream cheese, wild rice mix, carrot, frozen chopped broccoli, slivered almonds ; preparation:Bring rice to boil, then reduce heat& simmer 10 minutes. Add broccoli& carrots. Simmer 5 minutes. Add soup& cream cheese. Stir until melted. Just before serving, top each serving with slivered almonds, if desired. ; name: navy beans ; ingredients: dried navy beans, virgin olive oil, onion, garlic, bay leaf, fresh thyme, chicken stock, salt, black pepper ; preparation:

name: creamy mashed potatoes with chives ; ingredients: yukon gold potatoes, nonfat milk, salt, light cream cheese with chives and onions ; preparation:Place potatoes in a dutch oven, and cover with water. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat, and simmer for 10 minutes or until tender. Drain. Return potatoes to pan. Add the milk and salt. Mash the potato mixture with a potato masher to desired consistency. Add the cheese, and stir just until blended. ; name: chili cheese grits ; ingredients: water, grits, velveeta mexican cheese, butter, eggs, jalapeno peppers, red bell pepper, salt ; preparation:Preheat the oven to 350. Grease a 9x9 ovenproof dish. Boil the water and add the grits. Stir and lower the heat to simmer and simmer 5 minutes. Turn off heat and add the cheese and butter into the grits and stir. Let the cheese and butter melt then stir in the eggs. Stir in the peppers and the salt. Transfer in the the 9x9 dish. Bake at 350 for 45 minutes. ; name: cranberries in the sun ; ingredients: mandarin orange sections, whipping cream, cooked rice, orange peel, jellied cranberry sauce, sugar, cornstarch, lemon juice, orange, lettuce leaves ; preparation:Drain mandarin oranges, reserving 1 tablespoon liquid. Whip cream. Fold in rice, orange peel, and mandarin oranges. Chill. In small saucepan, break up cranberry sauce. Stir in sugar, cornstarch, lemon juice, and reserved mandarin orange syrup. Cook and stir until mixture is thickened and bubbly. Cool sauce to room temperature. Spoon mounds of rice mixture on lettuce leaves. Halve orange slices and arrange around mounds. Spoon cranberry sauce on top. ; name: vegan sweetened condensed milk ; ingredients: soymilk, margarine, sugar, salt ; preparation:Place the soy milk into a heavy-based saucepan. Heat to boiling. Heat the margarine in a separate pan. Add the sugar and mix with a wooden spoon. Pour in the hot milk mixture when the sugar has dissolved. Add a pinch of salt. Mix well. Continue to boil gently, stirring frequently, for another 5 minutes, or until it thickens a little. Remove from heat and leave to cool.
